text.key: （薬草や食べれる植物や果物もなっている豊かな森だ。[p]
text.en-US: (This forest is abundant in plants, herbs, and edible fruits.[p]

text.key: （深くまで行かなければ危険な生き物に会うこともないだろう。[lr]
text.en-US: (If we don't go in too deep we don't have to worry about running into any wild animals.[lr]

text.key: （シルヴィを連れて散策してみよう。[p]
text.en-US: (Let's go exploring a bit with Sylvie.[p]

text.key: こんなところがあったんですね。[lr]
text.en-US: So there was a place like this.[lr]

text.key: じゃあ、ご一緒させてください。[p]
text.en-US: Then, please allow me to accompany you.[p]

text.key: 森をお散歩ですか？[lr]
text.en-US: A walk in the forest?[lr]

text.key: はい、ご一緒させてください。[p]
text.en-US: Okay, please allow me to accompany you.[p]

text.key: （もうそろそろ日が暮れる…。[p]
text.en-US: (The sun has almost set...[p]

text.key: （今日はここらで切り上げて家に帰ろう。[p]
text.en-US: (Let's call it a day around here and head home.[p]

text.key: あ、あそこ、小さな鳥が。[lr]青くて、綺麗な鳥ですね。[p]
text.en-US: Ah, over there. There's a small bird. [lr]What a beautiful, blue bird.[p]

text.key: あ、蝶々が飛んでいますよ。[lr]綺麗…。[p]
text.en-US: Ah, a butterfly is flying. [lr]So pretty...[p]

text.key: [name]、あそこリスがいますよ、[lr]かわいい。[p]
text.en-US: [name], there's a squirrel over there. [lr]How cute.[p]

text.key: あ、いっちゃった…。[p]
text.en-US: Ah, it ran away...[p]

text.key: あ、毛虫…。[lr]こういう動きは、見ていて気持ち悪くなっちゃいます。[p]
text.en-US: Ah, a caterpillar... [lr]Just looking at how it moves makes me feel kind of sick.[p]

text.key: あ、ナメクジ…。[lr]
text.en-US: Ah, a slug...[lr]

text.key: そういえばここら辺、他より少し湿ってますね。[p]
text.en-US: Now that I think about it, this area is damper than other places.[p]

text.key: …別のほうに行って見ませんか？[p]
text.en-US: ...Shall we go somewhere else?[p]

text.key: 鳥の声が綺麗ですね。[lr]
text.en-US: The bird songs are beautiful.[lr]

text.key: いろんな方向から聞こえてくる…。[p]
text.en-US: I can hear them from many directions...[p]

text.key: ここ、水が流れてますね。[p]
text.en-US: There's water flowing through here.[p]

text.key: （飛び越せそうな幅の小さな川が流れている[p]
text.en-US: (There was a river small enough to jump across.[p]

text.key: キラキラ光って音もなんだか綺麗…。[p]
text.en-US: The water's sparkling, and the sound is kind of pretty...[p]

text.key: あ、っと。[p]
text.en-US: Ah, whoops.[p]

text.key: （転びかけたシルヴィを抱きとめる。[p]
text.en-US: (I catch the stumbling Sylvie.[p]

text.key: すいません、何かにつまづいて…。[lr]
text.en-US: I'm sorry, I seem to have tripped on something...[lr]

text.key: すごい色のキノコですね。[lr]
text.en-US: What a flashy coloured mushroom.[lr]

text.key: こういうのは、きっと毒があるんですよね。[p]
text.en-US: Mushrooms like this are probably poisonous, right?[p]

text.key: すごいおっきなきのこ。[lr]
text.en-US: What a big mushroom.[lr]

text.key: 食べれるきのこだったらお腹一杯食べれそうですね。[p]
text.en-US: If this is edible, just one would be enough to fill your stomach.[p]

text.key: これ、本棚の図鑑で見たような。[lr]
text.en-US: I think I've seen this in the encyclopedia on the bookshelf.[lr]

text.key: [name]、これお役に立つものじゃありませんか？[p]
text.en-US: [name], isn't this something useful?[p]

text.key: （これは…残念ながらただの雑草だ。[p]
text.en-US: (This is... unfortunately just a weed.[p]

text.key: そうですか…。なにか、お役に立てればと思ったんですけど…。[p]
text.en-US: Is that so... I just thought, if I could be useful, then...[p]

text.key: （これは…薬の材料になる薬草だ。[p]
text.en-US: (This is... a plant that can be used as an ingredient for medicine.[p]

text.key: 本当ですか？[lr]
text.en-US: Really?[lr]

text.key: 私、[name]の役に立てましたか？[p]
text.en-US: Was I useful to you, [name]?[p]

text.key: （雨が降ってきた…。[p]
text.en-US: (It's started to rain...[p]

text.key: あ、雨。[lr]小雨だし、すぐ止みそうだけど…。[lr]
text.en-US: Ah, rain. [lr]It's just light rain so it will probably stop soon, but...[lr]

text.key: 木で雨の当たらないところを歩きましょうか。[p]
text.en-US: Let's go somewhere under some trees so we won't get too wet.[p]

text.key: 日差しが強いですけど、木陰は涼しいですね。[p]
text.en-US: The sun is really strong today, but the shade feels nice and cool.[p]

text.key: 少し開けていて、空がよく見えますね。[lr]
text.en-US: There's a small clearing here where you can see the sky clearly.[lr]

text.key: 日の光が綺麗…[p]
text.en-US: The sunlight is so beautiful...[p]

text.key: 風が涼しいですね。[lr]木がある所と街の風ってぜんぜん違って感じます。[p]
text.en-US: The breeze is really nice. [lr]The breeze is really different here compared to in the town.[p]

text.key: 街と違って人気がないから、[name]と二人きりを感じられますね…。[p]
text.en-US: The forest isn't popular like the town, so it feels like it's only you and me here, [name]...[p]

text.key: …風が止んで、静かですね。[lr]
text.en-US: ...The breeze stopped and it's become quiet.[lr]

text.key: まるで、[name]と世界で二人っきりみたい…。[p]
text.en-US: As if it's just you and me in this world, [name]...[p]

text.key: …向こうで何か動いたような。[lr]なにかの動物でしょうか…？[p]
text.en-US: ...I think something moved over here. [lr]Is it some animal...?[p]

text.key: あ、綺麗なお花。[lr]面白い形をしてて、街では見かけない花ですね。[p]
text.en-US: Ah, what a pretty flower. [lr]It has a unique smell, and I've never seen it in town before.[p]

text.key: 人もいなくて、建物もなくって、[lr]
text.en-US: There are no people, and no buildings. [lr]

text.key: 街を散歩するのとはぜんぜん違いますね。[p]
text.en-US: This is completely different from taking a walk in town.[p]

text.key: 大きな木ですね。[lr]
text.en-US: What a big tree.[lr]

text.key: これだけ育つのにはきっと長くかかるんでしょうね。[p]
text.en-US: It must take a long time for it to grow this big.[p]

text.key: 木が倒れてますね。[lr]
text.en-US: There's a fallen tree here.[lr]

text.key: 誰かが切ったわけじゃなさそうですけど。[p]
text.en-US: It doesn't seem like anyone cut it down...[p]

text.key: （倒れてからだいぶたっているようだ。[lr]
text.en-US: (It seems like it's been a while since it's fallen.[lr]

text.key: 落雷でもあったのかもしれない[p]
text.en-US: I wonder if it was struck by lightning or something.[p]

text.key: こんな風にゆっくり木を眺めながら自由にお散歩なんて、[r]
text.en-US: I had never imagined being able to take a leisurely walk [r]

text.key: 想像したことありませんでした。[p]
text.en-US: while quietly admiring the trees.[p]

text.key: 自然のなかをお散歩するのもいいですね。[lr]
text.en-US: It's fun taking a nature walk every once in a while.[lr]

text.key: 一人だったら怖いだろうけど、[r]
text.en-US: It may be scary if it was just myself, [r]

text.key: [name]と一緒だとなんだか落ち着きます。[p]
text.en-US: but when I'm together with you, [name], it's very relaxing.[p]

text.key: ここら辺は木が日を遮っていて、少し薄暗いですね。[lr]
text.en-US: The trees are blocking the sun and it's kind of dark here.[lr]

text.key: 虫とかいないか、ちょっと気になっちゃいます。[p]
text.en-US: I'm worried there might be bugs around here.[p]

text.key: [name]、その、手を握ってもいいですか？[p]
text.en-US: [name], um... May I hold your hand?[p]

text.key: 木が多くて道がないところはちょっと歩きづらいですね。[lr]
text.en-US: There are a lot of trees so it's difficult to walk off the path.[lr]

text.key: 転ばないようにしなくちゃ…。[p]
text.en-US: I need to be careful not to trip...[p]

text.key: 青々としていて素敵な森ですね。[lr]
text.en-US: This is such a nice, lush forest.[lr]

text.key: でも、街灯もないし、日が暮れると真っ暗なんですよね？[lr]
text.en-US: But there are no lights, so it must be completely dark once the sun sets, right?[lr]

text.key: そうなったら、すごく怖そう…。[p]
text.en-US: If that is the case, it'd be very scary...[p]

text.key: 私の育った街のそばにも森がありました。[lr]
text.en-US: The town I grew up in also had a forest nearby.[lr]

text.key: でも、野犬が出るから近づくなって言われてました。[p]
text.en-US: However, I was told wild dogs live there so not to go near it.[p]

text.key: だからこういう自然のあるところには行ったことがありませんでしたね[p]
text.en-US: That's why I've never been to a place like this before.[p]

text.key: 昔は、森は怖いイメージでした。[lr]
text.en-US: Before, I used to imagine the forest as a scary place.[lr]

text.key: …森だけじゃなかったのかな。[p]
text.en-US: ...Maybe it wasn't just the forest.[p]

text.key: 知らないものはなんでも怖かったです。[lr]
text.en-US: Maybe I was just afraid of everything I didn't know.[lr]

text.key: でも今は、[name]がいれば、新しいこともワクワクします。[p]
text.en-US: However, now that I'm with you, [name], I feel excited discovering new things.[p]

text.key: 赤くて綺麗な木の実ですね。[lr]
text.en-US: Such beautiful, red berries. [lr]

text.key: …これ毒があるんですか？[lr]
text.en-US: ...Are they poisonous? [lr]

text.key: 見た目は美味しそうなのに、残念ですね。[p]
text.en-US: Even though it looks tasty... How unfortunate.[p]

text.key: あそこ、なんだかたくさんの虫が群がるように飛んでますね。[p]
text.en-US: There are a lot of bugs swarming over there.[p]

text.key: （動物の死骸でもあるのかもしれない。迂回していこう。[p]
text.en-US: (There may be a carcass over there. Let's go around it.[p]

text.key: （ピンクの花を見つけた。[p]
text.en-US: (I found a pink flower.[p]

text.key: ずいぶん鮮やかな花ですね。[p]
text.en-US: What a colourful flower.[p]

text.key: （この間手に入れた本に書かれていた薬の材料だ。[lr]
text.en-US: (This is an ingredient I saw in the book from that time. [lr]

text.key: いくらか摘んでおこう。[p]
text.en-US: Let's pick some.[p]

text.key: （何かの薬に使えると聞いたことがあるが、なんだったろうか。[lr]
text.en-US: (I've heard this can be used for some sort of medicine, but I wonder what it was. [lr]

text.key: 仕事で使うものではないので忘れてしまった…。[p]
text.en-US: It's not something I can use for work so I'll forget about it...[p]

text.key: （青い花を見つけた。[p]
text.en-US: (I found a blue flower.[p]

text.key: 落ち着いた色の綺麗な花ですね。[p]
text.en-US: What a beautiful flower.[p]

text.key: （リラックス効果のあるハーブだ。[lr]
text.en-US: (It's an herb that has a relaxing effect. [lr]

text.key: お茶にもできるし薬にもなる。いくらか摘んでおこう。[p]
text.en-US: You can make tea with it and even use it for medicine. I'll pick some.[p]

text.key: ここ、少し開けてて休憩できそう。[p]
text.en-US: There's an open area here where we can rest. [p]

text.key: [name]、少しゆっくりして行きませんか？
text.en-US: Shall we take a small break, [name]?

text.key: ん、そうですね。[lr]
text.en-US: Mn, that's true.[lr]

text.key: あんまりのんびりしすぎて日が暮れちゃってもいけないし…。[p]
text.en-US: If we're too slow then the sun will set before we get back...[p]

text.key: （シルヴィと二人で具合の良さそうな芝生の上に腰掛ける。[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie and I sit on a comfortable looking spot.[p]

text.key: （シルヴィは隣に身を寄せ腕を絡めてきた…。[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie sits next to me and wraps her arms around mine...[p]

text.key: （しばらくシルヴィと自然の空気を味わった…。[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie and I just taste the fresh air for a while...[p]

text.key: [name]がこうしてくれると家の外でもリラックスできちゃいます…。[p]
text.en-US: I can relax even outside the house when you do this to me, [name]...[p]

text.key: はい、わかりました。[p]
text.en-US: Yes, I understand.[p]

text.key: はい、じゃあ着替えてきますね。[p]
text.en-US: Thank you, I'll go change now, okay?[p]

text.key: お仕事、頑張ってお手伝いします。[p]
text.en-US: I'll do my best to help you with your work.[p]

text.key: （シルヴィに仕事を少し手伝ってもらう事にした。[p]
text.en-US: (I decided to have Sylvie help a little with my work.[p]

text.key: （今日はここら辺で切り上げよう…。[p]
text.en-US: (Let's stop here for today...[p]

text.key: 今日はおしまいですか？[p]
text.en-US: Are we finished for today?[p]

text.key: はい。お疲れ様でした、[name][p]
text.en-US: Okay. You worked hard today, [name].[p]

text.key: この書類、どこにしまっておけばいいですか？[p]
text.en-US: Where should I store this document?[p]

text.key: お仕事といっても、それほど忙しくはなりませんね。[p]
text.en-US: Even though it's work, it's not all that hectic, is it?[p]

text.key: 平和な証拠だからいいことではありますけど。[p]
text.en-US: It's proof that life here is peaceful, though, so that's a good thing.[p]

text.key: いつかお薬の調合とかもきちんと覚えて、[r]
text.en-US: Someday I want to be able to properly make tea and such,[r]

text.key: もっとお役に立てるように…。[p]
text.en-US: so that I can be of even greater use to you...[p]

text.key: 棚を少し整理しておきますね。[p]
text.en-US: I'll go organize the shelves, okay?[p]

text.key: 傾いた書類や薬入れを直すぐらいで、順番は変えないように…。[p]
text.en-US: Straightening the slanted files and medicine bottles, making sure not to mess up the order...[p]

text.key: この棚少しほこりっぽいですね。[p]
text.en-US: This shelf seems a little dusty.[p]

text.key: 軽く掃除しておきます。[p]

text.key: ご主人様が家のことをやってるのを、奴隷の私がただ見ているだけというのは…。[p]
text.en-US: As a slave, I can't stand by and watch as you work around the house...[p]

text.key: （役割がないと捨てられるのでは、と不安になっているのかもしれない[p]
text.en-US: (She might be worrying that she'll be thrown away if she doesn't do anything.[p]

text.key: はい、わかりました。[lr]お掃除とお皿洗いですね。[p]
text.en-US: Yes, I understand.[lr] Cleaning and washing dishes.[p]

text.key: 精一杯頑張ります。[p]
text.en-US: I will do my very best.[p]

text.key: ぁ…すいません。[lr]なんでもないです。[p]
text.en-US: Ah... I'm sorry.[lr] It's nothing.[p]

text.key: （朝になってもシルヴィは与えた部屋から出てくる様子がない。[lr]部屋に様子を見に行くとシルヴィは苦しそうな顔でうなされている。[p]
text.en-US: (Even though it is morning, Sylvie doesn't show any signs of coming out from her room.[lr] I went into the room to check, and Sylvie looked like she was in pain.[p]

text.key: （額に手をやるとひどい熱があるようだ。[lr]本人が平然としているから触れなかったが、思えば昨晩も酷くやつれた顔をしていた。[p]
text.en-US: (I put my hand on her forehead. She has a terrible fever.[lr] She didn't seem to be especially bothered by anything so I didn't check, but now that I think about it she seemed exhausted last night.[p]

text.key: （食事も喉を通らないらしい。[lr]与える薬も吐き出してしまう。[p]
text.en-US: (She couldn't eat anything.[lr] She threw up any medicine I gave her.[p]

text.key: （…数日後に彼女は事切れた。[lr]恐らくここに来る前から衰弱していたのだろう[p]
text.en-US: (...A few days later, she passed away.[lr] She was likely already very weak before she came here.[p]

text.key: （朝、部屋から出ると、シルヴィが窓の外を眺めていた[p]
text.en-US: (As I left my room this morning, I saw Sylvie looking out the window.[p]

text.key: おはようございます。[lr]
text.en-US: Good morning.[lr]

text.key: 今日は、お仕事はお休みですか。[p]
text.en-US: You are not working today?[p]

text.key: 代わりに午前中に買い出し…ですか。[lr]
text.en-US: Instead you're... going out shopping during the day.[lr]

text.key: はい、行ってらっしゃいませ。[p]
text.en-US: Yes, please take care.[p]

text.key: （…そういえばここに来てからシルヴィを一度も外に出していない[p]
text.en-US: (...Now that I think about it, Sylvie hasn't gone outside a single time since she came here.[p]

text.key: では、お気をつけて。[lr]
text.en-US: Please take care.[lr]

text.key: 私はお部屋のお掃除を済ませておきます。[p]
text.en-US: I will clean the room while you are gone.[p]

text.key: （一人で買い出しに行き、必要なものを買って帰る…。[p]
text.en-US: (I left alone, bought some necessities, and went back home...[p]

text.key: 私も、ですか？[p]
text.en-US: Am I... going as well?[p]

text.key: （シルヴィは黙って後ろをついてきている。[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie silently follows behind me.[p]

text.key: （一見落ち着いているが目は右へ左へと忙しく動いている。[lr]
text.en-US: (She seems calm at first, but her eyes are darting left and right nervously.[lr]

text.key: 街に出たことがあまりないのだろう。[p]
text.en-US: It doesn't seem like she's used to being in town.[p]

text.key: （しばらく歩いていると一瞬シルヴィの足が止まった[p]
text.en-US: (After walking for a while, Sylvie stops for a moment.[p]

text.key: あ、ごめんなさい。なんでもないです。[p]
text.en-US: Ah... I'm sorry. It's nothing.[p]

text.key: （ふと甘い香りが鼻をくすぐる。[lr]
text.en-US: (A sweet aroma tickles my nose.[lr]

text.key: 通りかかった喫茶店の匂いに気を引かれたらしい[p]
text.en-US: It seems like a nearby cafe drew her attention.[p]

text.key: （少し早いが昼食を食べていこうか。[p]
text.en-US: (It's a little early, but we'll get some lunch.[p]

text.key: …お昼をここで、ですか？[p]
text.en-US: ...Will we be... having lunch here?[p]

text.key: （店内に入ると妙なしゃべり方をする店員がおどけたような動きで飛んできた。[p]
text.en-US: (The moment we entered the cafe an employee with a strange manner of speech came awkwardly flying over to us.[p]

text.key: こちらへどうぞー？[p]
text.en-US: Right this way, okay?[p]

text.key: （案内された席にシルヴィと座った[p]
text.en-US: (I sat down at the assigned table with Sylvie.[p]

text.key: （メニューに目を通し自分用にサンドイッチを注文する。[p]
text.en-US: (Flipping through the menu, I decide to order a sandwich for myself.[p]

text.key: シルヴィは物珍しげに辺りを見回し、向かいの席の客が頼んだパンケーキに目を止めていた。[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie looks around the store curiously, and her gaze stops on the pancakes a customer across the cafe ordered.[p]

text.key: （シルヴィの用の注文は…[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie will have...[p]

text.key: （シルヴィにも同じものでいいだろう。[lr]
text.en-US: (Sylvie can have the same as I'm having.[lr]

text.key: サンドイッチを合わせて２つ注文する。[p]
text.en-US: I ordered two sandwiches.[p]

text.key: （注文したものが机に運ばれてきた。[p]
text.en-US: (The food I ordered arrives.[p]

text.key: これ、私の分ですか？[lr]
text.en-US: Is this... my portion?[lr]

text.key: ありがとうございます。いただきます[p]
text.en-US: Thank you very much for the meal.[p]

text.key: （お互い手早くサンドイッチを食べ終え店を出る。[lr]
text.en-US: (We both hurriedly eat our sandwiches and leave the restaurant.[lr]

text.key: 早く買い出しをして帰ろう。[p]
text.en-US: I want to finish shopping and hurry home.[p]

text.key: （しばらくして注文したものがテーブルに運ばれてきた。[p]
text.en-US: (After a while, the food I ordered arrives at the table.[p]

text.key: あ、これ…。私に？[p]
text.en-US: Ah, this... is for me?[p]

text.key: （シルヴィは初めて少し頬が緩くなった表情をみせる。[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie had a small smile on her face for the first time.[p]

text.key: （本人もそれに気がついたのか、慌てて表情を取り繕ってしまう。[p]
text.en-US: (Maybe she had noticed herself, as she immediately went back to her usual expressionless self.[p]

text.key: （さておき自分の昼食も食べ終えた。[lr]
text.en-US: (I also finished eating my sandwich.[lr]

text.key: 軽く買い出しをして帰るとしよう。[p]
text.en-US: I should do some light shopping and head home.[p]

text.key: （ふと不思議な雰囲気の店が目に入る。[lr]
text.en-US: (Suddenly, a strange store entered my vision.[lr]

text.key: 外から中は見えず、なんの店なのかいまいち判断できない。[lr]
text.en-US: I can't see inside the store from outside, and I can't guess what kind of store it is.[lr]

text.key: 試しにドアを開けてみる。[p]
text.en-US: Let's try opening the door.[p]

text.key: （どうやら女物の服を中心に扱っている店内だ。[lr]
text.en-US: (It seems like a store dealing mostly in women's clothes.[lr]

text.key: 風変わりな柄や奇抜なデザインの服もちらほらと見える。[p]
text.en-US: There are a lot of clothes with strange patterns and eccentric designs.[p]

text.key: あら、いらっしゃいませ。[p]
text.en-US: Oh my, welcome.[p]

text.key: （店内を見回していると不思議な雰囲気の女性が近寄ってきた。[p]
text.en-US: (As I looked around the store a strange woman approached me.[p]

text.key: あらあら、今日はこちらのお嬢さんのお洋服をお探しにきたんですか？[lr]
text.en-US: My oh my, are you looking for clothes for this girl today?[lr]

text.key: そうでしょう？そうであってくださいな。[r]いえ、そうに違いありませんわ。[p]
text.en-US: Am I right? Please let me be right.[r] No, I must be right.[p]

text.key: だって、とても失礼なことを言うようですけど、[r]そのお嬢さんの格好は服を売ってる身としては悪い意味で見逃せませんもの。[p]
text.en-US: I mean, I may be out of place for saying so,[r] but as someone who sells clothes I just can't excuse the way that she's dressed.[p]

text.key: ほんのちょっと待っていただけますこと？[r]この子にぴったりなお洋服を見繕ってさしあげますわ。[p]
text.en-US: Could you please wait for a little bit?[r] I'll choose something that will be just perfect for her.[p]

text.key: ほらほら、こっちへいらっしゃい。[p]
text.en-US: Come on, come over here.[p]

text.key: え…。あっ。[p]
（止める間もなく怪しげな女性はシルヴィを店の奥へと連れて行ってしまった。[p]
text.en-US: (Without giving me any time to object, the strange woman took Sylvie deeper into the store.[p]

text.key: お待たせいたしました。[p]
text.en-US: I'm sorry for the wait.[p]

text.key: どうですかお客様？[lr]見違えるようじゃございません？[p]
text.en-US: How is this, dear customer?[lr]Isn't she completely different from before?[p]

text.key: （シルヴィは少し品の良い服に身を包んでいる。[lr]
text.en-US: (Sylvie was wearing graceful-looking clothes.[lr]

text.key: 着なれないのか少し落ち着かない様子だ。[p]
text.en-US: Perhaps she isn't used to wearing such things as she looks uncomfortable.[p]

text.key: 年頃の娘にあんなほつれた布切れ１枚なんてあんまりですわ。[lr]
text.en-US: Having a girl her age only wear a single rag is just too much.[lr]

text.key: こっちの方がとても素敵だと思いません？[p]
text.en-US: Don't you think these are much more fitting?[p]

text.key: 私こちらのお洋服お買い上げすることを強くお勧めいたします。[p]
text.en-US: I strongly recommend buying these clothes.[p]

text.key: （どうしようか？[p]
text.en-US: (What shall I do?[p]

text.key: ああ、お客様。とても賢明な判断だと思いますわ。[lr]身だしなみは人の品格を左右しますもの。[p]
text.en-US: Oh, dear customer. That was a very wise decision.[lr] One's looks can affect one's dignity.[p]

text.key: これでこのお嬢さんもお客様にふさわしい素敵なレディーです。[p]
text.en-US: Now this girl looks like a dignified lady worthy of you.[p]

text.key: （半ば強引にシルヴィの新しい服を一式購入してしまった。[p]
text.en-US: (I was halfway forced into buying new clothes for Sylvie.[p]

text.key: …あの、ご主人様[p]
text.en-US: ...Um, Master...[p]

text.key: 私にこんなお洋服、もったいないです…。[lr]
text.en-US: These clothes are wasted on me...[lr]

text.key: 今からでも返品しに行った方が…。[p]
text.en-US: Perhaps it would be better to return them...[p]

text.key: ご主人様は、それでいいんですか…？[p]
text.en-US: Are you fine with that, Master...?[p]

text.key: …じゃあ、ありがたく、着させていただきます。[p]
text.en-US: ...Then, I will gratefully accept them.[p]

text.key: え、その…。[lr]…ありがとう、ございます。[p]
text.en-US: Eh... Um...[lr]...Thank you... very much.[p]

text.key: でも、私…奴隷なのに…。こんな…。[p]
text.en-US: But, I'm... a slave, so... these...[p]

text.key: …いえ、なんでもないです。[p]
text.en-US: ...No, it's nothing.[p]

text.key: あら、それはそれは残念ですわ…。[lr]
text.en-US: Oh my, that's a pity...[lr]

text.key: でも、気が変わったらまたお越しくださいな。[p]
text.en-US: However, please do come again if you change your mind.[p]

text.key: いつでもお待ちしておりますわ。[p]
text.en-US: I will be waiting.[p]

text.key: おはようございます…けほっ[p]
text.en-US: Good morning...*cough*[p]

text.key: （朝、部屋から出てきたシルヴィはひどく顔色が悪く見える。[lr]
text.en-US: (In the morning, Sylvie's complexion looked terrible.[lr]

text.key: 体調が悪いようだ。[p]
text.en-US: It seems like she's sick.[p]

text.key: すいません…[lr]
text.en-US: I'm sorry...[lr]

text.key: もしかしたら、風邪をひいてしまったかもしれません[p]
text.en-US: It seems like I may have caught a cold.[p]

text.key: （額に手を置いてみる…。[lr]
text.en-US: (I place my hand on her forehead...[lr]

text.key: 触れただけで熱の高さがはっきりと伝わる。[p]
text.en-US: I can tell just by touching that she has a high fever.[p]

text.key: （一応休んでいるように言っておく。[p]
text.en-US: (I'll tell her to get some rest.[p]

text.key: はい、すいません。今日は、寝かせていただきます…。[p]
text.en-US: I understand. I'm sorry. I will rest for today...[p]

text.key: （シルヴィの体調は数日経っても良くならなかった。[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie's condition didn't improve after several days.[p]

text.key: おそらく、ここに来る前から体にかかっていた負担が限界になったのだろう。[p]
text.en-US: Most likely, her body that had been under massive stress since before she came here had reached its limit.[p]

text.key: （ろくに食事や薬も飲み込めなくなり、[r]
text.en-US: (She could hardly eat any food or drink medicine,[r]

text.key: 免疫の落ちた体は些細な体調不良をきっかけにみるみる衰弱していった。[p]
text.en-US: and her health slowly began to deteriorate.[p]

text.key: （しばらくして、シルヴィは静かに息を引き取った…。[p]
text.en-US: (After a while, Sylvie silently drew her last breath...[p]

text.key: （ベッドに寝かせ、消化に良い食事と薬を用意する。[p]
text.en-US: (I place her on her bed and prepare some medicine and food that is easy to digest.[p]

text.key: …ご主人様？そこまでしてくれなくても。[p]
text.en-US: ...Master? You don't need to do so much for me.[p]

text.key: （ただの風邪だろうが少し熱が高い、用心に越したことはないだろう[p]
text.en-US: (It may just be a cold but her fever is pretty high. Better safe than sorry.[p]

text.key: （案の定シルヴィの体調はしばらく良くならなかった[p]
text.en-US: (Just as I had thought, Sylvie's condition didn't improve for a while.[p]

text.key: ケホッ…コホッ…。[p]
text.en-US: _*cough*...*cough*...[p]

text.key: 昔に風邪をひいたときは、こんなに長引かなかったんですけど…。[p]
text.en-US: The last time I caught a cold, it didn't last for so long...[p]

text.key: （ここに来る前の生活で体が弱っていたのだろう。[p]
text.en-US: (Her body is probably weak from the way she was treated before coming here.[p]

text.key: …おはようございます。[lr]
text.en-US: ...Good morning.[lr]

text.key: もう、だいぶ楽になりました。[p]
text.en-US: I feel a lot better now.[p]

text.key: （シルヴィの額に手を当てる。[p]
text.en-US: (I place my hand on Sylvie's forehead.[p]

text.key: （どうやら熱は下がったようだ[p]
text.en-US: (It seems like her fever's gone down.[p]

text.key: ご迷惑をおかけしました。[lr]
text.en-US: I'm sorry for the inconvenience I've caused.[lr]

text.key: 家事やお手伝いもまたできそうですし、もう大丈夫です。[p]
text.en-US: I feel like I can help with the housework again. I'm fine now.[p]

text.key: …ありがとうございました。[p]
text.en-US: ...Thank you very much.[p]

text.key: ご主人様。[p]
text.en-US: Master.[p]

text.key: ご主人様は私に、ひどいことをしませんよね？[p]
text.en-US: Master, you won't do anything terrible to me, right?[p]

text.key: ここに来る前は、私…毎日痛くて苦しくて…。[lr]
text.en-US: Before I came here, every day was so painful...[lr]

text.key: 泣いても、笑っても、受ける仕打ちは変わりませんでした。[lr]
text.en-US: No matter how much I cried or laughed, it didn't change the treatment I received.[lr]

text.key: ただ受け入れる以外はできなくて。[p]
text.en-US: I couldn't do anything but accept it.[p]

text.key: それをいちいち悲しんでいたら、耐えられませんでした。[p]
text.en-US: If I felt sad about it every time, I wouldn't have been able to endure it.[p]

text.key: だから、何も考えないようにしようって。[lr]もう…悲しくて泣いたり、うれしくて笑うのはやめようって思ったんです。[p]
text.en-US: That's why I tried to not think about anything.[lr]That's why I thought... I'd stop crying when I felt sad, or... Smiling when I felt happy.[p]

text.key: 希望を持っても、不幸を嘆いても、何もいいことなんてなかったから。[p]
text.en-US: Because no matter how much I hoped, or how much I cursed my misfortune, nothing good ever happened.[p]

text.key: 最初ここにきて、ご主人様は酷いことはしなくて…[lr]今まで私が会ってきた人たちとは違うんじゃないかって思いました。[p]
text.en-US: When I first came here, Master didn't do anything terrible to me...[lr] I thought that maybe you were different from everyone I've met until now.[p]

text.key: でも、期待はしないようにしてたんです。[lr]もしまた希望を持って、それで裏切られたら…私きっともう耐えられません…。[p]
text.en-US: But, I tried stopping myself from thinking that.[lr]If I hope for something and I get betrayed again... I don't think I could endure it anymore...[p]

text.key: なのに、それでもご主人様はやさしくって、暖かくって…。[lr]私、どうしたらいいのかわからないです。[p]
text.en-US: Even still, Master has been so kind and warm...[lr]I... don't know what to do anymore.[p]

text.key: ご主人様、私…ご主人様のこと…信じていいんですか？[p]
text.en-US: Master, I... I can... I can trust you, right, Master?[p]

text.key: …[p]…私、信じます。[lr]その言葉。[p]
text.en-US: ...[p]...I will... believe them.[lr] Those words.[p]

text.key: 今まで、無愛想で、ご主人様の優しさも無視してて、[lr]
text.en-US: I apologize for acting unsociably and

text.key: 本当にすいませんでした。[p]
text.en-US: _ ignoring Master's kindness until now.[p]

text.key: …ご主人様はいつもそうやって優しくて、[lr]
text.en-US: ...Master has always been so kind, [lr]

text.key: 裏切ったことなんてありませんでしたよね…。[p]
text.en-US: and has never betrayed me...[p]

text.key: …私、ご主人様のお役に立てるようがんばります。[lr]
text.en-US: ...I will try hard to be of use to you, Master. [lr]

text.key: だから、私が笑っても、泣いても、見捨てないでください…。[p]
text.en-US: So, when I laugh, or when I cry, please don't throw me away...[p]

text.key: やさしいままの、ご主人様で…。[p]
text.en-US: Please always be my kind master...[p]

text.key: （寝る前にこの前シルヴィが言っていたことが頭をよぎる。[p]
text.en-US: (Before I go to sleep, what Sylvie had said crosses my mind.[p]

text.key: （シルヴィに声をかける。[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie called out to me.[p]

text.key: え…。ご一緒してもいい？[p]
text.en-US: Um... May I join you?[p]

text.key: （寝支度を整えているとシルヴィが部屋にやってきた。[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie, who was in her sleepwear, came into the room.[p]

text.key: あの、ご主人様。その…。[p]
text.en-US: Um, Master... Um...[p]

text.key: 私、よく怖い夢を見るんです。[lr]昔のこととか、後ろ向きな妄想とか、寝てる時に思い出してしまって。[p]
text.en-US: I... frequently see nightmares. [lr]Like remembering things from the past, or negative thoughts.[p]

text.key: それで、夜中に起きてしまうこともよくあって…。[p]
text.en-US: And... I usually wake up in the middle of the night...[p]

text.key: それで…。[lr]あの…。[p]
text.en-US: That's why... [lr]Um...[p]

text.key: （何か言いずらそうにしていてなかなか次の言葉が出てこない。[p]
text.en-US: (She seems to have something difficult to say and has trouble continuing.[p]

text.key: それで、お願いなんですけど。[lr]…ご主人様と同じ部屋で寝させていただいたら、ご迷惑でしょうか？[p]
text.en-US: That's why... I have a favor to ask. [lr]Would it be an inconvenience if... I slept in the same room as you, Master?[p]

text.key: （そうは言ってもこの部屋にはベッドは一つしかない…[p]
text.en-US: (Even if she says that, this room only has one bed...[p]

text.key: あの、嫌でなければ、一緒のベッドで…。[p]
text.en-US: Um... If you don't mind, on the same bed...[p]

text.key: ご主人様となら、きっと安心できそうな気が…。[p]
text.en-US: I feel like if it's with Master I will have some peace of mind...[p]

text.key: 本当ですか？[p]
text.en-US: Really?[p]

text.key: こんなに甘えてしまって、ご迷惑だとは思いますけど…。[lr]
text.en-US: I feel like I'm being an inconvenience, being spoiled this much, but...[lr]

text.key: お願いします。[p]
text.en-US: Thank you very much.[p]

text.key: （シルヴィと一つのベッドに入った。[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie and I got into the same bed.[p]

text.key: （すぐ隣で寝息を立てる無防備な少女が気になって少し寝るまで時間がかかった…。[p]
text.en-US: (It took me a while to get to sleep because I wasn't used to the sleeping, defenseless girl who was breathing softly next to me...[p]

text.key: （朝、起きるとシルヴィは先に起きていたようで、服を着替えてベッドの縁に座っていた。[lr]
text.en-US: (Morning. As I wake up, I notice Sylvie had woken up before me. She had already changed and was sitting at the end of the bed.[lr]

text.key: どうやら少し寝坊してしまったらしい。[p]
text.en-US: It seems like I overslept a little.[p]

text.key: あ、おはようございます。[p]
text.en-US: Ah, good morning.[p]

text.key: 昨日は、思った以上にぐっすり寝られました。[lr]朝まで目が覚めなかったし、悪い夢も見なかったし。[lr]
text.en-US: Yesterday I slept a lot better than I expected.[lr]I didn't wake up in the middle of the night, and I didn't see any bad dreams either.[lr]

text.key: ありがとうございました。[p]
text.en-US: Thank you very much.[p]

text.key: 今日は私が朝食を用意したんで、よければ召し上がってください。[lr]
text.en-US: I prepared breakfast today, so please have some if you would like.[lr]

text.key: パンと、卵とベーコンを焼いただけですけど。[p]
text.en-US: Though all I have done is cook bread, eggs, and bacon.[p]

text.key: あと、その…[lr]よければこれからも、時々一緒に寝てもらってもいいですか？[p]
text.en-US: And, um... [lr]If you don't mind, would it be fine for me to sleep with you again from time to time?[p]

text.key: …そうですよね。ご迷惑ですよね。[p]
text.en-US: ...I understand. It would be an inconvenience.[p]

text.key: なんでもないです。[lr]どうか、忘れてください。[p]
text.en-US: It was nothing. [lr]Please forget about it.[p]

text.key: （シルヴィは自分の部屋へと戻っていった。[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie returned to her own room.[p]

text.key: （寝支度を整え、ベッドに腰掛けると部屋にシルヴィがやってきた。[p]
text.en-US: (As I was preparing to sleep and sat on the bed, Sylvie entered the room.[p]

text.key: （最近ではほぼ毎日のように同じベッドでシルヴィと眠っている。[p]
text.en-US: (Recently, Sylvie has been sleeping in the same bed as me on a daily basis.[p]

text.key: （すぐ隣に腰掛けこちらを見上げるシルヴィ。[lr]
text.en-US: (Sylvie sits down next to me and looks at me.[lr]

text.key: いつもとはどこか様子が違う。[p]
text.en-US: Something seems a little different from usual.[p]

text.key: なんども申し上げていますけど。私、[name]にすごく感謝してます。[lr]
text.en-US: I've said it many times, but I am really grateful towards [name].[lr]

text.key: 食べ物に、お洋服に、たくさん頂いてしまってます。[lr]
text.en-US: I've received many meals and clothes from you.[lr]

text.key: だから少しでもお返しをしたいって思ってるんです。[p]
text.en-US: That's why I thought that I would like you repay your kindness.[p]

text.key: それでいろいろ考えたんですけど、[lr]
text.en-US: So I thought about many things, [lr]

text.key: 私簡単なお手伝いぐらいしかできないし。[p]
text.en-US: but I can only do simple tasks around the house.[p]

text.key: それで、その…。[lr]
text.en-US: That's why, um...[lr]

text.key: …あの、[name]。[lr]
text.en-US: ... Um... [name].[lr]

text.key: [name]は、恋人とかはいないんですよね。[p]
text.en-US: [name], you don't have any lovers, right?[p]

text.key: もし、夜のお相手が…欲しいのであれば。[lr]
text.en-US: Um... If you want someone to keep you company at night... [lr]

text.key: わ、私と…、[l]私を…だ、抱いてくださいませんか？[p]
text.en-US: W-With me... [l]Will you... Will you have me?[p]

text.key: 私、経験はないですけど、[lr]
text.en-US: I... don't have any experience, but... [lr]

text.key: こういうことも…奴隷として[name]にできることです…よね？[p]
text.en-US: This is something... That I can do as a slave for [name]... right?[p]

text.key: 私、[name]にだったら…。[lr]
text.en-US: I... If it's with [name]...[lr]

text.key: いや、私も…[name]と、[lr]
text.en-US: No... I also... With [name]... [lr]

text.key: 形だけでも…む、結ばれたい…なんて[p]
text.en-US: Even if it's only physical... I want to be with you...[p]

text.key: ううん、それは…おこがましいですね。[lr]
text.en-US: No, that's... presumptuous of me.[lr]

text.key: ただ、[name]の為に何かできないかという話です。[p]
text.en-US: I was just wondering if there was something I could do for [name].[p]

text.key: 私、発育も悪いし、醜い傷もあります…。[lr]
text.en-US: I... haven't really developed... and I have ugly scars all over my body... [lr]

text.key: 魅力なんてないとは思います。[p]
text.en-US: I don't think I have any appeal at all.[p]

text.key: それでも…もし、[name]が求めてくれるなら…私…[p]
text.en-US: Still... If... [name] wants me, then I...[p]

text.key: …はい、そうですよね。[lr]私なんかが…。[p]
text.en-US: ...I understand.[lr] Someone like me...[p]

text.key: でも、もし気が変わったら、おっしゃってください。[p]
text.en-US: However, if you do change your mind, please tell me.[p]

text.key: では、おやすみなさいませ…。[p]
text.en-US: Then, have a good night...[p]

text.key: （少しこわばった様子を見せながらもシルヴィは体を預けてきた。[p]
text.en-US: (Though she seems stiff, Sylvie offers her body to me.[p]

text.key: （キスを繰り返し、ゆっくりシルヴィの服を脱がせる。[p]
text.en-US: (We exchange kisses and I gently remove Sylvie's clothes.[p]

text.key: （頬に当てた手をなぞるように下ろしていき、そっと下腹部に触れる。[p]
text.en-US: (I take my hand that was on her cheek and slowly trace down her body until I reach her lower abdomen.[p]

text.key: （優しく愛撫を始めると秘部はゆっくりと湿り気を帯びてくる。[p]
text.en-US: (I begin to caress her gently and she starts to gradually get wetter.[p]

text.key: [name]に…[lr]抱いて、頂けるんですね…。[p]
text.en-US: [name] is... [lr]Going to take me...[p]

text.key: （力の抜け始めたシルヴィをベッドに横たえた。[p]
text.en-US: (I lay Sylvie onto the bed.[p]

text.key: （日が上がってそう間もない早朝[lr]
text.en-US: (In the early hours of the day,[lr]

text.key: 落ち着いたノックの音が聞こえた。[p]
text.en-US: there was light knocking on the door.[p]

text.key: （今日は誰かを招く予定は入っていない[lr]
text.en-US: (I didn't plan to meet with anyone today,[lr]

text.key: 予約もなく尋ねてくるような知人もいない[lr]
text.en-US: And I don't have any friends who'd drop by without saying so either.[lr]

text.key: 誰だろう？[p]
text.en-US: Who could it be?[p]

text.key: どうも先生。[p]
text.en-US: Greetings, doctor.[p]

text.key: （ドアを開けると怪しげな中年の男が家の前に立っていた。[p]
text.en-US: (I opened the door, and there was a suspicious middle-aged man standing in front of my house.[p]

text.key: 覚えておいでですか？[lr]
text.en-US: Do you remember me?[lr]

text.key: 昔先生に命を拾ってもらったものですよ。[p]
text.en-US: You saved my life in the past.[p]

text.key: （…男の顔と記憶を照らし合わせる[lr]言われてみれば見覚えのある顔だ[p]
text.en-US: (...I look at the man's face and try to remember.[lr]Now that he mentions it, I do vaguely recognize his face.[p]

text.key: そうです、昔この町外れで倒れていたところを先生が助けてくださった。[lr]
text.en-US: That's right. Long ago you saved me when I had collapsed in the outskirts of town.[lr]

text.key: ロクでもないトラブルが原因なことは側からでも分かったでしょうに、[lr]
text.en-US: Even though you knew involving yourself would bring nothing but trouble...[lr]

text.key: お医者様の性分というものだったのでしょうかね。[p]
text.en-US: I wonder if it's just in a doctor's nature.[p]

text.key: さておきあの時はろくにお礼もできずに去ってしまって、申し訳ありませんでした。[lr]
text.en-US: I apologize that I left at that time without thanking you properly.[lr]

text.key: 偶然近くの町に立ち寄ったものですから、今日はお礼に参ったのです。[p]
text.en-US: I happened to be nearby, so I thought I'd come to give my thanks.[p]

text.key: （どこか胡散臭い男だがわざわざお礼に来たというのだ、とりあえずお茶でも入れようか…[p]
text.en-US: (He's certainly suspicious, but he went out of his way to come thank me. Maybe I should make some tea...[p]

text.key: いえ、そう長く時間を取るつもりはないのでお構いなく。[lr]
text.en-US: Oh no, I'm fine. I don't plan to take too much of your time.[lr]

text.key: とりあえずこれを…。[lr]
text.en-US: For now, please accept this...[lr]

text.key: あの時は持ち合わせもなく、治療費も払えませんでしたからね。[p]
text.en-US: At that time I had nothing on me, so I couldn't even pay for my treatment.[p]

text.key: （男は懐から封筒をだしこちらによこす[lr]
text.en-US: (The man handed me an envelope.[lr]

text.key: 中を改めると治療費と言うには少々多い金が入っている。[p]
text.en-US: Inside was more money than one would expect for just treatment fees.[p]

text.key: 支払いが遅れてしまったほんのお詫びです。[lr]
text.en-US: My payment was delayed until now, so please consider it as an apology.[lr]

text.key: 遠慮せず受け取ってください。[p]
text.en-US: Please accept it.[p]

text.key: あともう一つ、持ってきたものがあるのですが、[r]これからするお話は内密にお願いできますか？[p]
text.en-US: I have one more thing I brought with me, but... [r]May I come inside before we discuss this?[p]

text.key: …さすが先生、話がわかる。[lr]
text.en-US: As expected of you, doctor.[lr]

text.key: …おい、こっちへ。[p]
text.en-US: ...Hey, come over here.[p]

text.key: （男がドアの裏へ声をかけるとドアの死角から一人の少女が姿を表す[p]
text.en-US: (The man raises his voice towards the door, and a girl walks in.[p]

text.key: 最近ある資産家が事故で亡くなりましてね。[lr]
text.en-US: A wealthy person died in an accident recently.[lr]

text.key: 近しい家族がいなかったものですから、役所やら親類や友人を名乗る者やらが寄ってたかって財産をさらっていきました。[p]
text.en-US: He didn't have any close relatives, so people claiming to be government officials, relatives, and friends came and stole all of his assets.[p]

text.key: 私もちょっとしたコネがありまして、そのおこぼれを頂戴したのですが、[lr]
text.en-US: I have a few connections here and there so I was able to get some of the leftovers,[lr]

text.key: 代わりに厄介な物もいくつか押し付けられてしまったんです。[p]
text.en-US: but I was also entrusted with a few troublesome items.[p]

text.key: ええ、こいつがその一つです。[p]
text.en-US: Yes, this one here is one of them.[p]

text.key: 今の私はしがない商人でして、[lr]
text.en-US: I am but a humble merchant now,[lr]

text.key: 「なんでも」取り扱うことを売りにしているので、うまく売っぱらえということだったのですが…。[p]
text.en-US: and my motto is to buy and sell "anything", so I was told to sell this off somehow, but...[p]

text.key: 人の身の売買なんて、肉体労働ができる商品ならまだしも、こんなガキは信頼できる買い手はすぐには見つからないんですよ。[lr]
text.en-US: When it comes to buying and selling people, it'd be fine if the one in question could be used for manual labor, but it's not easy finding a buyer for a brat like this.[lr]

text.key: 下手に急いでことを進めると私も不利益を被りかねません。[p]
text.en-US: If I rush things, there is a possibility that I may suffer some losses too.[p]

text.key: 元手がかかっているわけでもないので、[r]
text.en-US: It's not like I need to break even on this one,[r]

text.key: 結局下手なことはせず、適当に処分するか捨ててしまおうかとも思ったのですが…。[p]
text.en-US: so rather than doing something stupid, I thought of either disposing of her or throwing her away, but...[p]

text.key: 私にだって良心や哀れみはあるものです。[lr]
text.en-US: Even I have some conscience and compassion.[lr]

text.key: 面倒や不利益はごめんだが、よい引取先がいないものかと考えたところ、[lr]
text.en-US: I want to avoid anything troublesome, but I didn't have anywhere I could hand this one off to.[lr]

text.key: ちょうど今進めている商談のあるこの町で、昔先生に助けられたことを思い出したのです。[p]
text.en-US: I was doing business in this town, and then I remembered that you had saved my life once before.[p]

text.key: 見たところあの時と変わらず先生はお一人で暮らしているようですし、[lr]
text.en-US: From what I can tell it seems that you are still living by yourself,[lr]

text.key: 余計なお世話でしょうが少々寂しい生活をされているのではと思いまして…。[lr]
text.en-US: and it may be none of my business, but I thought that you may be feeling a bit lonely...[lr]

text.key: 急な話ですがこいつを引き取ってはみませんか？[p]
text.en-US: It's a bit sudden, but would you take this one in?[p]

text.key: そうですか。[lr]
text.en-US: I see.[lr]

text.key: まぁとつぜんの話だ、無理もありませんね。[p]
text.en-US: Well, it was sudden so I guess it can't be helped.[p]

text.key: お時間頂きありがとうございました。[lr]では私らは失礼します。[p]
text.en-US: Thank you for your time.[lr]I shall take my leave.[p]

text.key: （男と少女は去っていった[p]
text.en-US: (The man left with the girl in tow.[p]

text.key: そうですか、私もこいつも助かります。[p]
text.en-US: Is that so! It'll help both me and this girl out.[p]

text.key: こいつは身寄りもない奴隷です。[lr]
text.en-US: This girl is a slave without any relatives.[lr]

text.key: 家の手伝いをさせてもいいし、先生にその趣味があるならおもちゃにしたって咎める人もいないでしょう…。[lr]
text.en-US: You can have her help around the house, or if you have such preferences you can treat her like your toy. There is no one who would object.[lr]

text.key: こいつについての詳しい話はこいつから直接聞いてください。[p]
text.en-US: If you want to know more about her, you can ask her.[p]

text.key: では私は失礼します。[lr]
text.en-US: Then, I shall take my leave.[lr]

text.key: 改めてあの日助けていただいたこと、ありがとうございました。[p]
text.en-US: Once again, thank you very much for saving me that day.[p]

text.key: （男は去っていった[p]
text.en-US: (The man left.[p]

text.key: 改めて初めまして、シルヴィと申します。[lr]
text.en-US: Nice to meet you. My name is Sylvie.[lr]

text.key: 引き取っていただいてありがとうございます。[p]
text.en-US: Thank you very much for accepting me.[p]

text.key: 力仕事はできませんが、申しつけてくれれば簡単な雑用ぐらいならできると思います。[p]
text.en-US: I cannot do heavy labor, but I believe I can do any simple chores that you would ask of me.[p]

text.key: ただ、前のご主人様は悲鳴を聞いて楽しむのが一番価値のある使い方だって言ってました。[p]
text.en-US: However, my previous master enjoyed hearing my screams the most.[p]

text.key: …お手柔らかに、お願いします。[p]
text.en-US: Please... treat me gently...[p]

text.key: （さて、どうしたものか…[p]
text.en-US: (Now, what should I do...[p]

text.key: …おはようございます、ご主人様[p]
text.en-US: ...Good morning, Master.[p]

text.key: （もう夜だ…寝支度をしよう[p]
text.en-US: (It's already evening... I should get ready for bed.[p]

text.key: …おやすみなさいませ[p]
text.en-US: ...Good night.[p]

text.key: （シルヴィは何をするでもなくただそこにいる[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie has nothing to do and just sits there.[p]

text.key: …何か？[p]
text.en-US: ...Is something wrong?[p]

text.key: （眺めていると視線があった[p]
text.en-US: (Her eyes met mine as I looked at her.[p]

text.key: （白い肌に浮かぶ鮮やかな赤い傷が目に入った[p]
text.en-US: (There are vivid red wounds all over her pale body.[p]

text.key: この痕ですか？[l]
text.en-US: These scars?[l]

text.key: もう、しばらく前のものだから、そんなに痛くはないです[p]
text.en-US: They are from long ago, so they don't hurt much anymore.[p]

text.key: （よく見てみるともう生傷ではなく、包帯を巻く必要はなさそうだ[p]
text.en-US: (After looking more carefully, the wounds don't seem raw so bandaging them isn't necessary.[p]

text.key: お話ですか？[lr]
text.en-US: Conversation?[lr]

text.key: そういうのはよくわからなくって…[p]
text.en-US: I'm not very good at it...[p]

text.key: （進んで会話してくれるつもりはないようだ[p]
text.en-US: (It doesn't seem like she intends to continue a conversation.[p]

text.key: （今までどんな暮らしをしてきたのだろう[p]
text.en-US: (Just what kind of life was she living until now?[p]

text.key: 前のご主人様のところにいた頃ですか？[lr]
text.en-US: When I was with my previous master?[lr]

text.key: 鞭打ちが日課で、あとは日替わりでいろいろと[p]
text.en-US: I was whipped daily, amongst other things...[p]

text.key: 身寄りもいないし、前のご主人様に飼っていただく前も施設にいました。[lr]
text.en-US: I don't have any relatives, so before I was taken in by my previous master I was in a facility.[lr]

text.key: 特にお話しできることは…[p]
text.en-US: I don't especially have anything to talk about...[p]

text.key: （話題は何かないものか[p]
text.en-US: (Isn't there something we can talk about?[p]

text.key: （シルヴィの傷跡を観察する…[p]
text.en-US: (I observe Sylvie's scars...[p]

text.key: 肌の跡は、肌を焼き溶かす薬品を塗られた時のものです。[lr]
text.en-US: These scars are from when corrosive chemicals were poured on me.[lr]

text.key: あんまり、思い出したくはないです[p]
text.en-US: I'd rather... not remember it.[p]

text.key: 痛いのは嫌いですけど…。[lr]
text.en-US: I dislike painful things, but...[lr]

text.key: ご主人様のする事には逆らうつもりはありません[p]
text.en-US: I don't intend to disobey anything Master wants me to do.[p]

text.key: （嫌だと思う気持ちがない訳ではなさそうだ[p]
text.en-US: (So it's not like she doesn't have anything she dislikes.[p]

text.key: （身につけているボロ布越しにも華奢で小柄な体がみて取れる[lr]
text.en-US: (I can see her short and slender body from over her rags.[lr]

text.key: 落ち着いた銀色の髪と瞳が印象的だ[p]
text.en-US: She has breathtaking silver hair and calm eyes.[p]

text.key: …どうかしましたか？[p]
text.en-US: ...Is there something wrong?[p]

text.key: （シルヴィの頭を撫でてみる[p]
text.en-US: (I pat Sylvie's head.[p]

text.key: …あの、何を？[l]頭を撫でている？[r]それはそうですけど…[p]
text.en-US: ...Um, what are you doing?[l] Are you patting my head?[r]That's fine, but...[p]

text.key: （困惑したような顔をしている[p]
text.en-US: (She looks confused.[p]

text.key: （特に反応はない[p]
text.en-US: (There's no particular reaction.[p]

text.key: …これに何か意味があるんでしょうか？[p]
text.en-US: ...Is there any meaning in doing this?[p]

text.key: よく、わかりません[p]
text.en-US: I don't... really understand...[p]

text.key: …楽しいん…ですか？[p]
text.en-US: ...Is this... fun?[p]

text.key: （柔らかな髪の感触が手に伝わる[p]
text.en-US: (I can feel her soft hair in my hand.[p]

text.key: どうぞ、お好きにしてください…[p]
text.en-US: Please, do as you wish...[p]

text.key: （シルヴィの視線はぼんやりと宙を眺めている[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie is staring blankly into space.[p]

text.key: （様子を伺っていたのが気になったようだ。[p]
text.en-US: (It seems like my staring bothered her.[p]

text.key: 痛いのは…最初に比べればだいぶ慣れました[p]
text.en-US: I've gotten used to the pain... Compared to the first time...[p]

text.key: あの、何もしないのですか…？[p]
text.en-US: Um... Are you not going to do anything...?[p]

text.key: ご命令があれば、できることはしますけど…[p]
text.en-US: If you have any orders for me, I will do what I am able to...[p]

text.key: ご主人様のお好きなように。[lr]
text.en-US: Do as you like, Master.[lr]

text.key: 私は奴隷ですから[p]
text.en-US: I am a slave, after all.[p]

text.key: 無表情…ですか？[p]
text.en-US: I'm... expressionless?[p]

text.key: すいません。[lr]表情を作らないのが、癖になってしまってて。[p]
text.en-US: I'm sorry.[lr] Not changing facial expressions has become a habit.[p]

text.key: ご主人様の用意してくださるお食事は、見た目も綺麗ですね。[p]
text.en-US: The meals Master prepares always look so nice.[p]

text.key: （パンと水に比べればそうだろう。[p]
text.en-US: (I bet it would, compared to just bread and water.[p]

text.key: 心なんて、なければよかったのに…[p]
text.en-US: It would have been better if I didn't have a soul...[p]

text.key: ご主人様の望むことなら、私はただ受け入れます。[lr]
text.en-US: I will accept whatever it is that Master wants to do.[lr]

text.key: 拒否権がないのはわかってます[p]
text.en-US: I know that I can't resist.[p]

text.key: 前のご主人様のような事はなさらないんですか？[p]
text.en-US: Will you not do things like my previous master did?[p]

text.key: 私は力仕事はできないから、叩かれて悲鳴を上げるのが仕事でした[p]
text.en-US: I can't do any heavy labor so getting hit and screaming was my duty.[p]

text.key: 撫でてる？さすってる？[lr]よくわからないです…。[p]
text.en-US: You're stroking my head? Patting my head? [lr]I don't understand...[p]

text.key: （不思議そうな顔をしている[p]
text.en-US: (She has a strange expression on her face.[p]

text.key: …何か、意味があるんですか？[p]
text.en-US: ...Is there any meaning in doing this?[p]

text.key: これで、楽しませるような反応はできないとおもいますけど…[p]
text.en-US: I don't think I can react in a way that will entertain you like this...[p]

text.key: ご主人様がしたいんなら…どうぞ、好きなだけ。[p]
text.en-US: If this is what Master wants to do... Please, do as you like...[p]

text.key: …楽しいんですか？[p]
text.en-US: ...Is this fun?[p]

text.key: 撫で心地が、良いん…ですか？[p]
text.en-US: Patting my head feels... good?[p]

text.key: よく、わかりません…[p]
text.en-US: I don't... understand...[p]

text.key: 別に、嫌ではないですけど…[p]
text.en-US: I don't... dislike it, but...[p]

text.key: 他に私がすることとか、ないんでしょうか？[p]
text.en-US: Is there nothing else for me to do?[p]

text.key: （シルヴィは窓の外を見ている。[lr]外出した時のことを思い出しているのかもしれない[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie is looking out the window. Maybe she's remembering about the time she went out?[p]

text.key: （視線があったがシルヴィは何も言わない[p]
text.en-US: (Our eyes meet but Sylvie doesn't say anything.[p]

text.key: ご主人様はお医者様なんですよね[p]
text.en-US: Master is a doctor, right?[p]

text.key: …しがない町医者？[lr]なにか違うんですか？[p]
text.en-US: ...Just a humble town doctor? [lr]Is there a difference?[p]

text.key: ご主人様は…多分、「優しい」んでしょうか？[p]
text.en-US: Master is... 「kind」, probably? [p]

text.key: また、お買い物にご一緒させてもらえることも、あるんでしょうか？[p]
text.en-US: Will I have another opportunity to accompany you when you go shopping?[p]

text.key: ああいう外出は初めてだったけど。[lr]
text.en-US: I've never gone out like that before.[lr]

text.key: たぶん…楽しかったんだと、思います[p]
text.en-US: I was... happy, I think.[p]

text.key: …なんでご主人様は私を引き取ってくれたんですか？[p]
text.en-US: ...Why did Master take me in?[p]

text.key: 何かお手伝いする事はありませんか？[p]
text.en-US: Is there anything I can do to help?[p]

text.key: ご主人様に引き取っていただけて、感謝…しています。[lr]
text.en-US: I'm... grateful that Master took me in.[lr]

text.key: でも、ここの生活は少し、怖いです…。[p]
text.en-US: But... The way I've been living here is also scary...[p]

text.key: 私、甘い味は好きです。[lr]
text.en-US: I... like sweet things.[lr]

text.key: 今まであんまり口にしたことはなかったけど。[p]
text.en-US: Though I haven't been able to eat many until now.[p]

text.key: ご主人様はお仕事以外ではあんまり人と会わないんですね[p]
text.en-US: Master doesn't meet many people aside from during work.[p]

text.key: 私と出かけると目立ってしまわないですか？[p]
text.en-US: Won't you stand out if you go out together with me?[p]

text.key: …やっぱり、お医者様でもこの傷跡は消せないんでしょうか。[p]
text.en-US: ...As I thought, even a doctor can't make these scars disappear.[p]

text.key: （髪を通してシルヴィの体温をかすかに感じる[p]
text.en-US: (I can just barely feel Sylvie's body heat through her hair.[p]

text.key: （シルヴィは目を閉じて静かにしている[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie closes her eyes and keeps quiet.[p]

text.key: 撫で心地が、良いんでしょうか？[lr]
text.en-US: Stroking my head... feels good? [lr]

text.key: 髪は、そんなに綺麗じゃないと思うんですけど…。[p]
text.en-US: I don't think my hair is that pretty...[p]

text.key: 少し、慣れてきたかもしれません[p]
text.en-US: I think... I'm starting to get used to this.[p]

text.key: こういう時に取るべき反応がきっとあるんでしょうけど…。[p]
text.en-US: There must be a proper way to react in a situation like this...[p]

text.key: …物好き、なんですね[p]
text.en-US: ...You like strange things, don't you?[p]

text.key: こうすることで、私もご主人様のお役に立てているんでしょうか？[p]
text.en-US: Am I being of use to Master like this?[p]

text.key: すこし、困ってしまいます[p]
text.en-US: I... feel slighly troubled.[p]

text.en-US: How am I supposed to react...?[p]

text.en-US: Master?[p]

text.en-US: Is this what they call 「kindness」?[p]

text.en-US: It's a feeling I can't put into words...[p]

text.key: …ご主人様？[lr]
text.en-US: ...Master?[lr]

text.key: どうかしましたか？[p]
text.en-US: Is something wrong?[p]

text.key: （前に比べると口調に柔らかさを感じる[p]
text.en-US: (Her tone sounds a lot softer compared to before.[p]

text.key: 痛いのに比べれば風邪なんてたいしたことないはずなのに、[lr]
text.en-US: Even though a cold should be nothing compared to pain, [lr]

text.key: 一人で寝ていると、心細くて。[p]
text.en-US: when I was sleeping alone I felt so helpless.[p]

text.key: でもご主人様がいてくれて、なんだか安心しました。[p]
text.en-US: But because Master was there I was able to relax a little.[p]

text.key: 流石、お医者様ですね。[lr]
text.en-US: As expected of a doctor.[lr]

text.key: ご主人様の看病で、すごく楽になりました。[lr]
text.en-US: Thanks to Master's care I feel a lot better now.[lr]

text.key: 身も…心も。[p]
text.en-US: Both in body... and mind.[p]

text.key: 今までも、体調を崩したことはありました。[p]
text.en-US: I've fallen ill a few times in the past.[p]

text.key: 一応、お薬ももらえたし、お休みももらえたけど。[lr]
text.en-US: I did receive medicine and rest, but... [lr]

text.key: 治ってからの責めが、いつもより酷くて…[p]
text.en-US: My treatment after I recovered was worse than usual...[p]

text.key: 体調は崩さないようにしないといけませんね。[lr]
text.en-US: I should be careful not to get sick.[lr]

text.key: ご主人様に迷惑をかけないためにも[p]
text.en-US: I don't want to cause any trouble for you, Master.[p]

text.key: あの、ご主人様…。[lr]
text.en-US: Um... Master...?[lr]

text.key: 見捨てないで、くれますか？[p]
text.en-US: You won't abandon me... will you?[p]

text.key: …ごめんなさい、忘れてください。[p]
text.en-US: ...I'm sorry. Please forget what I just said.[p]

text.key: ご主人様はなんで、やさしいんですか？[p]
text.en-US: Why is Master so kind?[p]

text.key: 私はご主人様のお役に立ててるでしょうか？[p]
text.en-US: Am I being useful to you, Master?[p]

text.key: 喜んだり希望を持ったりしなければ、[lr]
text.en-US: If I tried to not feel happiness or hope, [lr]

text.key: 痛いのも悲しいのも、少し楽になったんです。[lr]
text.en-US: bearing the pain and sadness became a little easier.[lr]

text.key: なのに…[p]
text.en-US: But I still...[p]

text.key: ご主人様は、私にひどいことはしないん…ですよね？[p]
text.en-US: You won't do horrible things to me, will you, Master?[p]

text.key: ご主人様のこと、信じてもいいんでしょうか…[p]
text.en-US: Is it... fine to trust you, Master?[p]

text.key: 私、どうしたらいいのか…[p]
text.en-US: What should I do...?[p]

text.key: こんなお洋服までもらってしまって…。[lr]
text.en-US: Receiving clothes like this...[lr]

text.key: 奴隷であることを忘れてしまいそうです…[p]
text.en-US: I almost feel like I will forget that I'm a slave...[p]

text.key: 私にはご主人様が、優しすぎます…[p]
text.en-US: Master, you are... too kind towards me...[p]

text.key: （前は静かに感じた警戒心を今は感じない。[p]
text.en-US: (I don't feel the wariness from her that I felt before.[p]

text.key: なんだか、慣れてきてしまいました[p]
text.en-US: Somehow, it seems like I've gotten used to this.[p]

text.key: その、悪くない気分です…[p]
text.en-US: It's, well... not a bad feeling...[p]

text.key: …あの、[lr]
text.en-US: Um... [lr]

text.key: ご主人様はこうするの、好きですね。[p]
text.en-US: Master really likes doing this.[p]

text.key: …私も、嫌いじゃないです。[p]
text.en-US: ...I don't dislike it either.[p]

text.key: 落ち着く、かもしれません。[p]
text.en-US: This calms me down a little, I think.[p]

text.key: ご主人様は多分…物好き、なんですね[p]
text.en-US: Master, do you happen to... like strange things?[p]

text.key: こうされることで、私もご主人様のお役に立ててればいいんですけど[p]
text.en-US: It would be nice if I am being of use to Master by having this done to me.[p]

text.key: どう反応すればご主人様は喜んでくれるんでしょう？[p]
text.en-US: What kind of reaction would make Master happy?[p]

text.key: こうしていただけると…[lr]
text.en-US: Being like this... [lr]

text.key: 嬉しい…んだと、思います。[p]
text.en-US: Makes me... happy, I think.[p]

text.key: ご主人様は優しいですね[p]
text.en-US: Master is nice.[p]

text.key: ふふっ。[l]
text.en-US: Hehe. [l]

text.key: あ、その。[lr]
text.en-US: Ah, um... [lr]

text.key: …なんでもないです。[p]
text.en-US: ...It's nothing.[p]

text.key: おやすみなさいませ、ご主人様[p]
text.en-US: Good night, Master.[p]

text.key: （目があうとシルヴィは笑顔を浮かべた[p]
text.en-US: (Sylvie smiles as our eyes meet.[p]

text.key: …ご主人様？[p]
text.en-US: ...Master?[p]

text.key: （ここに住み始めたころに比べると表情が朗らかになったようだ。[p]
text.en-US: (Her expressions have become a lot more lively and cheerful compared to when she first began living here.[p]

text.key: ご主人様は、私が笑ったり、泣いたりしても、ひどいことはしませんよね。[p]
text.en-US: Master doesn't do anything horrible to me, even when I'm happy or sad.[p]

text.key: ご主人様、私にお料理を教えてくれませんか？[lr]
text.en-US: Master, could you please teach me how to cook?[lr]

text.key: 上手になって、ご主人様のご飯を用意できたらなって…[p]
text.en-US: I was thinking it would be nice if I could become good and prepare meals for you, Master...[p]

text.key: ご主人様に引き取ってもらえて、私本当に運がよかったですね。[p]
text.en-US: I was really lucky to be taken in by you, Master.[p]

text.key: 奴隷だってこと、時々忘れてしまいそうになります。[p]
text.en-US: I forget that I'm a slave from time to time.[p]

text.key: …忘れてしまっても、いいんですか？[p]
text.en-US: ...I wonder if it's okay for me to forget...?[p]

text.key: ご主人様、どうか、見捨てないでください。[p]
text.en-US: Master, please don't abandon me.[p]

text.key: おいしいご飯を用意してくれて、[lr]
text.en-US: You cook delicious meals for me, [lr]

text.key: 素敵なお洋服を買ってくれて、[lr]
text.en-US: you buy amazing clothes for me, [lr]

text.key: 風邪を引いたら看病してくれて。[p]
text.en-US: and you take care of me when I'm sick.[p]

text.key: 本当に、感謝してます。[p]
text.en-US: I'm very, truly grateful.[p]

text.key: ご主人様のくれる「やさしい」が、怖くなくなってきました。[p]
text.en-US: The 「kindness」 that Master shows towards me has stopped being scary.[p]

text.key: あの、もう少し近くに座ってもいいですか？[p]
text.en-US: Um... May I sit a little closer to you?[p]

text.en-US: It was painful. I hated it.[p]

text.en-US: It's okay for me to have fun and laugh, right?[lr]

text.key: 許して、くれますよね？[p]
text.en-US: You will forgive me... right?[p]

text.key: 家事や掃除以外にも手伝えることがあったら言ってください。[lr]
text.en-US: If there's anything aside from cleaning and chores that I can do to help you, please ask.[lr]

text.key: ご主人様のお仕事もできることならお手伝いします。[p]
text.en-US: If there's anything I can do to help with Master's work, I will do anything I can.[p]

text.key: （だいぶリラックスしているように見える[p]
text.en-US: (She looks quite relaxed.[p]

text.key: もう、すっかり慣れちゃいました。[p]
text.en-US: I've gotten completely used to this.[p]

text.key: もう少し、続けてもらってもいいですか？[p]

text.key: もう、怖くありません…。[p]
text.en-US: This... isn't scary anymore...[p]

text.key: なんだか、安心します。[p]
text.en-US: For some reason I feel at ease.[p]

text.key: この気持ち…。私もご主人様にお返ししたいです。[p]
text.en-US: This feeling... I also want to share it with Master.[p]

text.key: ご主人様の手、大きいですね。[p]
text.en-US: Master's hand is big.[p]

text.key: 今まで知らなかった暖かさです。[p]
text.en-US: This is a kind of warmth that I haven't felt until now.[p]

text.key: 人と触れるのが、こんなに心地いいなんて。[lr]
text.en-US: To think contact with another person could feel so good...[lr]

text.key: 今までは痛くて怖いだけだったのに…。[p]
text.en-US: Even though I was scared of it until recently...[p]

text.key: 眠くなってきちゃいそうです。[p]
text.en-US: I'm starting to feel a little sleepy.[p]

text.key: こうされるの。好き…です。[p]
text.en-US: I... like having this done to me.[p]

text.key: 優しくって、暖かい…。[p]
text.en-US: Kind, and warm...[p]

text.en-US: For some reason I feel really relaxed...[p]

text.key: シルヴィにはまだ他人だと思われています。[r]
text.en-US: Sylvie still thinks of you as a stranger.[r]

text.key: シルヴィに知り合い程度に認識されています。[r]
text.en-US: Sylvie recognizes you as an acquaintance.[r]

text.key: シルヴィは同居人としてあなたを信頼し始めています。[r]
text.en-US: Sylvie is beginning to trust you as someone who lives with her.[r]

text.key: シルヴィはあなたとの時間を楽しんでいます。[r]
text.en-US: Sylvie enjoys the time she spends together with you.[r]

text.key: シルヴィはあなたに明確な好意を寄せています。[r]
text.en-US: Sylvie favors you greatly.[r]

text.key: シルヴィは１日でもあなたと離れたらパニックを起こしてしまうでしょう。[r]
text.en-US: Sylvie looks like she will have a panic attack if she is separated from you for even a single day.[r]

text.key: シルヴィはあなたがそばにいないと強い不安を感じてしまいます。[r]
text.en-US: Sylvie will feel incredibly anxious if you aren't nearby.[r]

text.key: シルヴィはあなたがいないと生きていけないと思っています。[r]
text.en-US: Sylvie thinks that she cannot live without you.[r]

text.key: シルヴィはもうあなたのことしか考えていません。[r]
text.en-US: Sylvie thinks of nothing else but you now.[r]

text.key: シルヴィはあなたのことを心から想っています。[r]
text.en-US: Sylvie thinks about you from the bottom of her heart.[r]

text.key: 呼び方を変えて欲しい…ですか？[lr]
text.en-US: You want me to change...how I address you?[lr]

text.key: はい、なんとお呼びすればいいでしょうか？[r]
text.en-US: How would you like to be addressed?[r]

text.key: （現在の呼び名「[name]」）
text.en-US: (Currently she calls me [name].)

text.key: -呼び名を入力してください-[p]
text.en-US: -Please enter a name-[p]

text.key: ん、同じ呼び方でいいんですか？[p]
text.en-US: Mm, so you'd like me to call you the same thing?[p]

text.key: じゃあこれからも[name]とお呼びしますね。[p]
text.en-US: Okay, from now on I will call you [name].[p]

text.key: はい。じゃあこれからは「[name]」ってお呼びしますね。[p]
text.en-US: I understand. From now on, I will call you [name].[p]

text.key: 私、兄弟はいませんけど。妹みたいに可愛がってくれたら嬉しいです。[lr]
text.en-US: I... don't have any siblings, but if you could treat me like your little sister I would be really happy.[lr]

text.key: [name]。[p]
text.en-US: [name].[p]

text.key: はい。じゃあこれからは「[name]」ってお呼びしますね。[lr]
text.en-US: I understand. From now on, I will call you「[name]」.[p]

text.key: あ・な・た…♡。[lr]
text.en-US: H・on・ey...♡[lr]

text.key: [name]…♡。[lr]
text.en-US: [name]...♡[lr]

text.key: 娘のように思ってくれてるってことなんでしょうか。[p]
text.en-US: I wonder if this means that you think of me like a daughter.[p]

text.key: お医者さまですから、こう呼ばれるのが慣れているんでしょうか。[p]
text.en-US: You are a doctor, so I suppose you are used to being addressed as such.[p]

text.key: …なんの先輩なんでしょう？[p]
text.en-US: ...What are you my senior in?[p]

text.key: 意味は「ご主人様」とそう変わらないですよね？響きは違いますけど。[p]
text.en-US: It's not so different from 「Master」, is it? I suppose it has a slightly different ring to it.[p]

text.key: …えんいー？[p]
text.en-US: ...Yen E？[p]

text.key: …[name]ってなんですか？[lr]
text.en-US: ... What is a [name]?[lr]

text.key: …アイドル？？ごめんなさい、よくわからないです[p]
text.en-US: ...An idol? I'm sorry, I don't really understand.[p]

text.key: 最初の呼び方はなんだか呼び慣れますね。[p]
text.en-US: I'm more used to addressing you as I first did.[p]

text.key: 普通はあまり年をとったような呼ばれ方は喜ばないと思ってましたけど…。[p]
text.en-US: I had thought that you wouldn't like being called in a way which makes you seem old...[p]

text.key: 愛しの人…。その通りでもちょっと呼ぶのが恥ずかしいですね。[p]
text.en-US: One's beloved... Even if it's true, saying it is still kind of embarrassing.[p]

text.key: …何か研究もなされているんですか？[p]
text.en-US: ...Are you doing some sort of research?[p]

text.key: スポーツを嗜んでいたことでもあるんですか？[lr]
text.en-US: Did you used to play sports, perhaps?[lr]

text.key: まさか、軍にいたことがあるとか…？[p]
text.en-US: You don't mean that you used to crew a ship, right...?[p]

text.key: はい。じゃあこれからは「[name]」とお呼びしますね。[p]
text.en-US: I understand. From now on, I will call you「[name]」.[p]

text.key: え…本当にそんな風に呼んで欲しいんですか？冗談じゃなく？[lr]
text.en-US: Eh... Do you really want me to refer to you that way? Not as a joke?[lr]

text.key: …どうしても呼んで欲しいというなら、わかりました。[p]
text.en-US: ...If you really do want me to call you that, then I will.[p]

text.key: でも、私を嫌いになったりしないでくださいね。[p]
text.en-US: Just don't hate me for it, okay?[p]

text.key: え…そんな風に呼ぶなんて、私にはできません。[lr]
text.en-US: Eh... I could never refer to you in such a way.[lr]

text.key: 何か、他の呼び方でどうかお願いします。[p]
text.en-US: Please, ask me to refer to you some other way.[p]

text.key: ん、いいんですか？[p]
text.en-US: Mn, is it alright?[p]

text.en-US: Changelog[r]

text.key: 一番最初に買っていただいた服ですね。[lr]
text.en-US: These are the clothes you first bought for me, aren't they?[lr]

text.key: [name]のところに来てからのこと、色々思い出します。[p]
text.en-US: It makes me think of all the memories I've made since coming to live with you, [name].[p]

text.key: 着なれてるし、一番落ち着く服かもしれません。[p]
text.en-US: I've grown so fond of it, it might be my favorite dress to wear.[p]

text.key: ひらひらしてて可愛い服ですよね。[lr]
text.en-US: Such a light and cute outfit.[lr]

text.key: 私もちゃんと可愛いですか？[lr]
text.en-US: Am I cute as well?[lr]

text.key: 服に見合ってないんじゃないかな…。[p]
text.en-US: I worry that I'm not cute enough to wear it...[p]

text.key: 作りは結構しっかりしてるけど、生地は柔らかくて着心地がいいですね。[lr]
text.en-US: It's very carefully-made, but the fabric's so soft and comfortable.[lr]

text.key: 手足を締めるものがないから動きやすいですし。[p]
text.en-US: There's nothing to get in the way of my arms and legs, so it's easy to move in too.[p]

text.key: 暑い日だと涼しくて過ごしやすいですね。[lr]
text.en-US: On hot days it's perfect for staying cool all day long.[lr]

text.key: …ちょっと子供っぽいかな？[p]
text.en-US: ...Isn't this outfit a little childish?[p]

text.key: 可愛い柄が入った生地だと、[r]
text.en-US: Having a material with cute patterns embedded in it, [r]

text.key: 飾り気はなくてもおしゃれしてる感じになれますね。[p]
text.en-US: even if I don't feel like showing it off, it still feels stylish.[p]

text.key: お仕事着ですね。[lr]
text.en-US: Ah, work clothes.[lr]

text.key: お手伝い頑張ります！[p]
text.en-US: I'll do my best to assist you![p]

text.key: 白は清潔な感じがしますね。[lr]
text.en-US: White sure gives off a sense of cleanliness.[lr]

text.key: やっぱりお仕事的にふさわしい感じがします。[p]
text.en-US: It's the perfect thing for work like yours.[p]

text.key: お医者さんや看護婦さんの仕事着って白のイメージが強いんですけど、[r]
text.en-US: White is the color I'd most associate with doctors and nurses, [r]

text.key: こういう色もあるんですね。[p]
text.en-US: but there are colors like these too, aren't there?[p]

text.key: 着るのがちょっと難しいですけど、とても綺麗な柄ですよね。[lr]
text.en-US: It's kind of difficult to put on, but this is a beautiful design.[lr]

text.key: 見とれてしまいそうです。[p]
text.en-US: I think I might be quite fascinated with it.[p]

text.key: ちょっと動きづらいので作業をするのには向かないですけど、[lr]
text.en-US: It's a little hard to move in so it's not very good to work in, [lr]

text.key: その代わり動作がおしとやかになって落ち着いた気分になります。[p]
text.en-US: but in exchange every move I make feels that much more graceful.[p]

text.key: これ結構動きやすいんですよね。[lr]
text.en-US: This outfit is pretty easy to move in.[lr]

text.key: 水兵さん用の服なら当たり前といえば当たり前かもしれないですけど。[p]
text.en-US: Though I suppose that makes sense, it being for a sailor and all.[p]

text.key: 襟が独特の形をしていて面白いですね。[lr]
text.en-US: This collar part is very peculiar, isn't it?[lr]

text.key: 赤いスカーフのワンポイントもなんだか見栄えがいい気がします。[p]
text.en-US: It and the red scarf together make it really attractive, I think.[p]

text.key: お家のお仕事頑張ります。[lr]
text.en-US: I'll do my best with the housework.[lr]

text.key: お掃除にお洗濯。いつかお料理やお裁縫もできるようになりたいですね。[p]
text.en-US: Cleaning and laundry. Someday I'd like to be able to cook and sew as well.[p]

text.key: お仕事着なのにこんなにフリフリしててリボンもついてて、[lr]
text.en-US: Even though these are clothes for working, they're so frilly with ribbons [lr]

text.key: おしゃれな服を着ている気分になります。[p]
text.en-US: that I can't help but feel stylish wearing it![p]

text.key: 生地が明るい色だとおしゃれなお洋服みたい。[lr]
text.en-US: With the material being such a bright color, these seem like stylish western clothes.[lr]

text.key: お家のお仕事で汚れるのがもったいなくなっちゃいますね。[p]
text.en-US: This makes me less worried about soiling my clothes while working.[p]

text.key: なんだかこれを着ると背筋が伸びるような気がします。[lr]
text.en-US: Somehow, this makes me feel like it'll make me grow taller.[lr]

text.key: 気持ちも引き締まりますね。[p]
text.en-US: It kind of makes me want to act more carefully too...[p]

text.key: 生地は硬めですけど、手触りは悪くないですね。[lr]
text.en-US: The material is on the stiff side, but it doesn't feel bad.[lr]

text.key: 詳しいことはわからないですけど、なんだか質がいい気がします。[p]
text.en-US: I'm not sure what these clothes represent exactly, but they're well-made![p]

text.key: 女の子っぽいおしゃれさはないけど、動きやすくて着心地はいいですね。[p]
text.en-US: It's not exactly girly, but it's easy to move in and feels very comfortable.[p]

text.key: 私がネクタイをするなんて、想像したこともありませんでした。[lr]
text.en-US: I never even dreamed that I would ever wear a necktie.[lr]

text.key: 似合ってますか？[p]
text.en-US: Does it suit me?[p]

text.key: なんだかとても育ちのいい女の子が着るような服ですよね。[lr]
text.en-US: These clothes seem like something a high-class woman would wear.[lr]

text.key: ほんの少し気が引けてしまいます。[p]
text.en-US: It kind of makes me feel a little awkward to be the one wearing it.[p]

text.key: ひらひらしてるけど落ち着いたデザインで、素敵なお洋服ですね。[p]
text.en-US: It's frilly yet such a composed design. What wonderful western clothes![p]

text.key: 着心地は悪くないんですけど、ズボンが履き慣れなくて少し落ち着かないですね…。[p]
text.en-US: These don't feel bad, but I'm not used to putting on pants yet, so...[p]

text.key: 男性っぽい組み合わせですけど、[r]
text.en-US: This is kind of a boyish outfit to wear, [r]

text.en-US: but the frills around the neck and the way it makes me look thinner give it a feminine touch![p]

text.key: ぴったり体にフィットするデザインですけど、それほど窮屈な感じはしませんね。[lr]
text.en-US: It's a form-fitting design, but it's not uncomfortably tight or anything.[lr]

text.key: 思ったより着心地がいいです。[p]
text.en-US: It's actually more comfortable than I thought![p]

text.key: この服、生地がとてもなめらかで柔らかいんですよ。[lr]
text.en-US: These clothes are made of such a soft, silky material![lr]

text.key: デザインの割にきつく感じないのは多分この生地だからだと思います。[p]
text.en-US: That it doesn't feel as tight as it looks is probably because of that, I think.[p]

text.en-US: As I thought, putting these on takes some time.[lr]

text.key: でもベルトや生地がしっかりしててなんだか強そうです。[p]
text.en-US: But the belts and the stiff material make it feel almost like armor.[p]

text.key: しっかりした服だから重いしあまり動きやすくはないですね。[lr]
text.en-US: This outfit is quite stiff, not to mention heavy and hard to move in.[lr]

text.key: でも苦しいってほどではないです。[p]
text.en-US: But it's not so tight that I can't breathe or anything.[p]

text.key: 意外としっかりした生地ですね。[lr]
text.en-US: This material is surprisingly thick, isn't it?[lr]

text.key: 思ったよりあったかいです。[p]
text.en-US: It's a lot warmer than I thought it would be.[p]

text.key: スカートがふんわりします。[lr]
text.en-US: The skirt is so light.[lr]

text.key: サラサラと言うより、モコモコ？[p]
text.en-US: Rather than rustling, I guess it's more foofy?[p]

text.en-US: I-It's nothing![p]

text.en-US: This is pretty big for me.[p]

text.en-US: Get wet...

text.en-US: When you do this it's really calming.[p]

text.en-US: It gives me peace of mind when you do this...[p]

text.key: 私も、[name]といると幸せなんですよ？[lr]

text.key: [name]がそう言ってくれるとなおさら…。[p]
text.en-US: To hear [name] say that just makes me love you even more...[p]

text.key: もうお腹すいてきましたか？[lr]
text.en-US: Ah, you're hungry already?[lr]

text.key: じゃあ今日のお昼は少し早めに準備しましょうか。[p]
text.en-US: Well then, how about we prepare lunch a little earlier today?[p]

text.key: そろそろお昼ですね。[lr]
text.en-US: It's almost noon after all.[lr]

text.key: 今日のご飯は何にしましょうか。[p]
text.en-US: What should we have to eat today?[p]

text.key: お昼ごはん、物足りなかったですか？[lr]
text.en-US: Was today's lunch not filling enough?[lr]

text.key: お茶にしてごまかすか…[lr]
text.en-US: Perhaps I could sate your hunger with tea...[lr]

text.key: あ、食後のデザートを食べに行くなんていうのはどうでしょうか？[p]
text.en-US: Ah, how about we go out for some dessert?[p]

text.key: そうですね、私も少しお腹すいてきました。[lr]
text.en-US: That's true, I'm a little hungry myself.[lr]

text.key: そろそろ夕食にしましょうか？[p]
text.en-US: Should we have dinner soon, then?[p]

text.key: 大丈夫ですか？[lr]
text.en-US: Are you all right?[lr]

text.key: 具合が悪かったら少し横になってます？[p]
text.en-US: If you're not feeling well, how about lying down?[p]

text.key: 風邪とかだったら早めに安静にしておいた方がいいですよね。[p]
text.en-US: If you have a cold or something it's better to get rest early, I think.[p]

text.key: 何か私にできることはありますか？[p]
text.en-US: Is there something I can do for you?[p]

text.key: お疲れですか？[lr]
text.en-US: Is it stress?[lr]

text.key: 私にできることがあったら言ってください。[p]
text.en-US: If there's anything I can do for you, please just ask.[p]

text.key: まだ目が覚めませんか？[lr]
text.en-US: Are you still not fully awake?[lr]

text.key: 冷たいお水で顔を洗うとかどうでしょうか[p]
text.en-US: How about washing your face with cold water?[p]

text.key: お昼の前後はなんだか眠くなっちゃいますね。[lr]
text.en-US: Mornings and evenings do make one tired, don't they.[lr]

text.key: 私もちょっとうとうとしちゃいます。[p]
text.en-US: I too can't help but feel a little woozy.[p]

text.key: お疲れなんでしょうか…。[lr]
text.en-US: I wonder if it's just stress...[lr]

text.key: 今日は少し早くお休みしますか？[p]
text.en-US: Perhaps we should go to bed early today?[p]

text.key: まだ、成長はするはずです。[lr]
text.en-US: I'm still growing so I'm sure they'll get bigger.[lr]

text.key: きっと…。[p]
text.en-US: I hope...[p]

text.key: やっぱり、大きいほうが魅力的に見えるんでしょうか？[lr]
text.en-US: I knew it, big boobs are more enchanting to you...[lr]

text.key: もうしばらく、待っていてください。[p]
text.en-US: Just give me time to grow and I'll...[p]

text.key: 普通より、小柄な方かもしれませんね。[lr]
text.en-US: I may be a little shorter than average, huh?[lr]

text.key: 昔の生活のせいもあるかもしれません。[p]
text.en-US: It may be a result of my previous experiences.[p]

text.key: 力もあまりないし、もうちょっと大きな方が[r]
text.en-US: I don't have much strength, so perhaps if I were a little bigger [r]

text.key: [name]のお役に立てることもあるんでしょうけど…。[p]
text.en-US: I could be more useful to [name] than I am now...[p]

text.key: 正直自分では私がその言葉にふさわしいのかわかりません。[lr]
text.en-US: To be honest, I'm not sure those words are suitable for me.[lr]

text.key: でも、[name]がそう思ってくれるならきっとそうなんでしょう。[p]
text.en-US: But if [name] thinks so then I'm sure it must be true.[p]

text.key: もっと可愛くなって[name]にもっと好きになってもらいたいです。[p]
text.en-US: I want to become even cuter so that [name] loves me even more.[p]

text.key: 昔の私だったら何を言っているのかわからなかったと思います。[lr]
text.en-US: I don't think I would've even understood you in the past.[lr]

text.key: でも、今は「[name]が私を可愛くしてくれたんだ」って信じられちゃいます。[p]
text.en-US: But now, I truly believe that you've made me as cute as I am.[p]

text.key: 大人になって、[name]の隣を歩いても[r]
text.en-US: Even if I become an adult and walk beside [name] [r]

text.key: [name]が恥ずかしくないような素敵な女性になりたいですね。[p]
text.en-US: I want to become a woman [name] wouldn't be embarrassed to be seen with.[p]

text.key: 顔立ちは…どうなんでしょう、自分ではよくわからないです。[lr]
text.en-US: What about...my face? I'm not so sure of it myself...[lr]

text.key: でも、[name]がそう言ってくれるのは嬉しいです。[p]
text.en-US: But I'm happy that [name] feels that way about me.[p]

text.key: でも、私を笑顔にしてくれるのは[name]なんですよ？[p]
text.en-US: But the one who makes me smile is you, [name], you know?[p]

text.key: ふふっ[lr]
text.en-US: Hehe![lr]

text.key: [name]がそんなこと言うと、もっと笑顔になっちゃいます。[p]
text.en-US: Hearing you say that just makes me smile more, [name].[p]

text.key: えっと…[lr]
text.en-US: Umm...[lr]

text.key: 私、何か褒められるようなことしましたっけ？[p]
text.en-US: Have I done anything worthy of your praise?[p]

text.key: [name]の役に立ててます？[lr]
text.en-US: Have I been useful to you, [name]?[lr]

text.key: …じゃあ、頭撫でてくれませんか？[p]
text.en-US: ...Then, could you pat my head?[p]

text.key: うぅ…、[name]のイヂワル…。[lr]
text.en-US: Uu... [name], you meanie...[lr]

text.key: …誰のせいだと思ってるんですか？[p]
text.en-US: ...Whose fault do you think that is?[p]

text.key: …だって、[name]がそうさせたんじゃないですか。[lr]
text.en-US: ...But that's just because [name] made me that way![lr]

text.key: 責任…とってくださいよ。[p]
text.en-US: Take...responsibility, [name].[p]

text.key: …いやらしい私は嫌いですか？[name]？[p]
text.en-US: ...Does my perverted side turn you off, [name]?[p]

text.key: 私が優しくなれるのは[name]が優しくしてくださるからですよ？[p]
text.en-US: If I'm nice to you it's only because you've been so nice to me, [name]![p]

text.key: 私は[name]の方がずっと優しいと思いますよ。[p]
text.en-US: I think you're a much better person than I am![p]

text.key: もう惨めな奴隷ではないですけど、[r]
text.en-US: I may no longer be a miserable slave, but [r]

text.key: そんな神々しいものにはなれませんよ。[p]
text.en-US: I could never be something so holy.[p]

text.key: どうかしましたか？[lr]
text.en-US: What's the matter?[lr]

text.key: 私でよければなんでもお話聞かせてください。[p]
text.en-US: If it's all right with you, I'll listen to whatever problem you have.[p]

text.key: 私に何かできることあるでしょうか？[p]
text.en-US: Is there anything I can do for you?[p]

text.key: えっと…頑張ってください、[name]♡[p]
text.en-US: Um... Do your best, [name]♡[p]

text.key: [name]ならきっと大丈夫です、頑張ってください。[p]
text.en-US: I'm sure you'll be fine, so do your best, [name]![p]

text.key: 私が[name]をですか？[lr]
text.en-US: You want me to pat your head, [name]?[lr]

text.key: はい、じゃあ失礼します。[p]
text.en-US: Well, excuse me, then.[p]

text.key: …[name]が私を撫でてくれる時もこんな感じなんでしょうか[p]
text.en-US: ...I wonder if this is how you felt while patting my head too.[p]

text.key: …いつも、ありがとうございます、[name]。[p]
text.en-US: ...Thank you for everything, [name].[p]

text.key: 謝るようなことは何もされていませんよ？[p]
text.en-US: But you haven't done anything you need to apologize for.[p]

text.key: そんな急に言われても…[lr]
text.en-US: If you ask me to do that out of the blue...[lr]

text.key: …笑えますね。[lr]
text.en-US: ...I guess I ended up smiling anyway.[lr]

text.key: 幸せってこういうことなんでしょうね[p]
text.en-US: I wonder if this is what happiness is?[p]

text.key: …はい♡[p]
text.en-US: ...Okay♡[p]

text.key: 昔だったらできなかったでしょうけど、[r]
text.en-US: I don't think I would have been able to in the past, but [r]

text.key: 今は自然と笑顔になれます。[p]
text.en-US: now I can smile perfectly naturally.[p]

text.key: はい、失礼します…。[lr]
text.en-US: Sure, excuse me then...[lr]

text.key: ふふっ…♡[p]
text.en-US: Hehe...!♡[p]

text.key: はい、喜んで♡[lr]
text.en-US: Yes, with pleasure♡[lr]

text.key: …あったかい[p]
text.en-US: ...So warm.[p]

text.key: はい…♡[lr]
text.en-US: Okay...♡[lr]

text.key: …[name]の近くにいるだけでなんでこんなに幸せなんでしょうね[p]
text.en-US: ...I wonder why just being close to [name] makes me so happy...[p]

text.key: はい、少しかがんでいただけますか？[p]
text.en-US: Okay, could you bend over a little, then?[p]

text.key: ちゅ…。[lr]
text.en-US: _*kiss*...[lr]

text.key: 私からするのって、なんだかちょっと新鮮ですね。[p]
text.en-US: Kissing you instead of the other way around is kind of refreshing.[p]

text.key: はい、[l]
text.en-US: Okay, [l]

text.key: んむ…。[p]
text.en-US: Mmf...[p]

text.key: 唇が重なるや否や舌が口に入り込んでくる[p]
text.en-US: The moment our lips met her tongue pushed its way into my mouth.[p]

text.key: ちゅ…れろ…。[lr]んむ…はぁ……じゅる…。[p]
text.en-US: _*kiss*...*lick*...[lr]Mmf...haah...*slurp*...[p]

text.key: ぷはぁ…[lr]
text.en-US: Pwaah...[lr]

text.key: んちゅ…ふぁ…[lr]んむ…はぁ……じゅる…[lr]ちゅ…れる[p]
text.en-US: Nn...*kiss*...fwaah...[lr]Mmnf...haah...*slurp*...[lr]*kiss*...*lick*[p]

text.key: ぷはぁ…[p]
text.en-US: Pwaah...[p]

text.key: はい、もちろんです。[lr]
text.en-US: Yes, of course.[lr]

text.key: [name]が望んでくれるならずっと離れません♡[p]
text.en-US: If that's what [name] wants I'll never leave your side♡[p]

text.key: むしろ私からお願いします。[lr]
text.en-US: I should be saying that to you.[lr]

text.key: どうか、ずっと一緒にいてください…♡[p]
text.en-US: Please, be with me forever...♡[p]

text.key: はい[p]
text.en-US: Okay.[p]

text.key: …[name]の手、大きいですね。[lr]
text.en-US: ...[name]'s hand sure is big.[lr]

text.key: 私の手が小さいだけ…ですか？[p]
text.en-US: Is it just... because my hands are so small?[p]

text.key: …優しい手ですね。[p]
text.en-US: ...What gentle hands these are...[p]

text.key: もちろんいいですよ？[p]
text.en-US: Of course you can![p]

text.key: …ぎゅ[lr]
text.en-US: ...*hug*[lr]

text.key: ふふっ…[name]…♡[p]
text.en-US: Hehe...! [name]...♡[p]

text.key: ん…あったかい[p]
text.en-US: Mm... So warm.[p]

text.key: …幸せです。[p]
text.en-US: ...I'm so happy...[p]

text.key: 今更確認を取るなんて、どうかしたんですか？[lr]
text.en-US: Asking permission after all this time, what's the matter?[lr]

text.key: もちろんいいですよ。[lr]
text.en-US: Of course it's all right.[lr]

text.key: 嫌だなんて言うはずないじゃないですか。[p]
text.en-US: As if I would ever say no.[p]

text.key: はい、なんですか[name]？[p]
text.en-US: Yes, what is it, [name]?[p]

text.key: はい、なんでしょう？[p]
text.en-US: Yes, what is it?[p]

text.key: はい、何かご用ですか？[p]
text.en-US: Yes? Do you need something?[p]

text.key: はい、あなたのシルヴィですよ、[name]♡[p]
text.en-US: Yes, I'm your Sylvie, [name]♡[p]

text.key: はい、おはようございます[lr]
text.en-US: Yes, good morning.[lr]

text.key: 今日もいいことがあるといいですね。[p]
text.en-US: I hope something good happens today too.[p]

text.key: はい。おはようございます。[lr]
text.en-US: Yes. Good morning.[lr]

text.key: でも、もうお昼ですよ？[p]
text.en-US: But it's already after noon...[p]

text.key: もうそろそろ「こんばんは」の時間だと思いますけど…[p]
text.en-US: I think "good evening" would be more appropriate right now...[p]

text.key: だいぶ気がはやいですね。[lr]
text.en-US: I think it's a little early for that.[lr]

text.key: まだ起きたばっかりじゃないですか。[p]
text.en-US: We just woke up, silly![p]

text.key: はい、こんばんは…[p]
text.en-US: Yes, good evening...[p]

text.key: 「こんばんは」には少し気が早いと思いますけど？[p]
text.en-US: I think it's a little early in the day for "good evening," don't you?[p]

text.key: はい、こんばんは。[lr]
text.en-US: Yes, good evening.[lr]

text.key: どうしたんですか？改まって。[p]
text.en-US: Is something the matter?[p]

text.key: 「こんにちは」というには少し早くないですか…？[p]
text.en-US: It's a little early for "good afternoon" don't you think...?[p]

text.key: はい、こんにちは。[lr]
text.en-US: Yes, good afternoon.[lr]

text.key: そろそろこんばんはの時間じゃないでしょうか？[p]
text.en-US: Don't you think "good evening" would be more fitting right now?[p]

text.key: はい、[name]もお疲れ様です。[p]
text.en-US: Yes, you too, [name].[p]

text.key: でも、私は大したことはしていませんよ？[p]
text.en-US: But I haven't really done anything much...[p]

text.key: …どうかしましたか、[name]？[p]
text.en-US: ...Is something wrong, [name]?[p]

text.key: …何か、顔についてます？[p]
text.en-US: ...Is there something on my face?[p]

text.key: …そんなに見られると、なんだか恥ずかしいです。[p]
text.en-US: ...If you stare at me that much, it's kind of embarrassing...[p]

text.key: あの人、綺麗ですけどちょっと怖くないですか？[lr]
text.en-US: That person is pretty, but don't you think she's a little scary?[lr]

text.key: …大きい方ですよね、あの店員さん。[lr]
text.en-US: ...That shopkeeper is is pretty big, isn't she?[lr]

text.key: いえ、その印象が強いというだけで、別に深い意味はないですけど。[p]
text.en-US: No, um, it's just she gives that impression, I didn't mean anything in particular by that...[p]

text.key: とてもおしゃれな方ですよね。[lr]
text.en-US: She's quite stylish, isn't she?[lr]

text.key: さすがお洋服屋さんをやっているだけあります。[p]
text.en-US: I suppose that's to be expected of the owner of a clothes shop.[p]

text.key: あの方のお店、素敵なお洋服がたくさんありますよね。[lr]
text.en-US: Her shop has so many wonderful clothes to choose from, doesn't it?[lr]

text.key: 何だか珍しい商品も多い気がします。[p]
text.en-US: I feel like there are lots of unusual clothes available as well.[p]

text.key: えっと、どなたでしょう？[lr]
text.en-US: Um, who was that again?[lr]

text.key: …あぁ、あのウェイトレスさんのお名前なんですか。[p]
text.en-US: ...Ahh, was that the name of that waitress?[lr]

text.key: あんなにフラフラしててよく食器を落とさないですよね。[lr]
text.en-US: Even though she looks so unsteady she never drops any plates.[lr]

text.key: 何だかすごいです。[p]
text.en-US: It's kind of amazing, actually.[p]

text.key: ちょっと変わった方ですよね。[lr]
text.en-US: She's kind of a strange person, isn't she?[lr]

text.key: マイペースというか何というか…。[p]
text.en-US: It's like she lives at her own pace or something...[p]

text.key: 一人だけ他の店員さんと服が違いますよね。[lr]
text.en-US: Her clothes are very different from that other shopkeeper and everyone else.[lr]

text.key: あの方だけ特別なんでしょうか、それとも格別珍しいことではないんでしょうかね？[p]
text.en-US: Is it because she's special, or is it not really that special after all?[p]

text.key: 三つ編みが長い方ですよね。[lr]
text.en-US: Her braids sure are long.[lr]

text.key: 邪魔になったり周りにぶつけたりしそうなものですけど、[l]
text.en-US: I was sure they would get in the way or hit things, but [l]

text.key: そういうところは見たことないですね。[p]
text.en-US: I've never seen anything like that happen to her.[p]

text.key: なんというかおどけたような酔っ払ったような…不思議な動きをする方ですね。[lr]
text.en-US: How should I put it... She's either wacky, or drunk... Her movements are very strange.[lr]

text.key: でもあんな動きしてたら普通疲れそうなのにそんな様子はないし、[r]
text.en-US: But even though moving like that all the time should wear her out, [r]

text.key: ミスをしたところも見たことないし、すごく運動神経がよさそうです。[p]
text.en-US: I've never seen her make a mistake and her reflexes are amazing.[p]

text.key: …女の人のお話をするのが好きなんですね。[lr]
text.en-US: ...You sure like to talk about other girls a lot.[lr]

text.key: いえ、別にいいんですけど。[p]
text.en-US: No, it's not like I care that much.[p]

text.key: …他の方のお話ばかりですね。[lr]
text.en-US: ...You only talk about women, huh.[lr]

text.key: いえ、なんでもないですよ。[p]
text.en-US: No, it's nothing![p]

text.key: …知ってますよ[lr]
text.en-US: ...I know that![lr]

text.key: …私だって[name]を一番愛してるんですからね？[p]
text.en-US: I love [name] more than anything in the world after all![p]

text.key: …なんのことですか？[p]
text.en-US: What are you talking about?[p]

text.key: …ふふっ[p]
text.en-US: ...Hehe![p]

text.key: えっと、それはどなたでしょうか？[lr]
text.en-US: Um, who was that again?[lr]

text.key: …あ、あの商人さんのお名前なんですか。[p]
text.en-US: ...Ah, could that be the name of that salesman?[p]

text.key: お一人でお出かけになった時にお会いしたんですか？[p]
text.en-US: Did you run into him while you were out shopping alone?[p]

text.key: 次こそはきちんとお礼をしたいですけど…[lr]
text.en-US: I wish I could thank him properly for all he's done for me...[lr]

text.key: もし、私がいない時にまたお会いしたらお礼を伝えておいてくださいませんか？[p]
text.en-US: If you see him again while I'm not there, could you give him my sincerest thanks?[p]

text.key: あの方が私を生かして[name]の所に連れて来てくださったんです。[lr]
text.en-US: He brought me back from the brink and took me to [name]'s doorstep.[lr]

text.key: 今の私の幸せはあの方のおかげでもあります。[p]
text.en-US: All of my current happiness is thanks to him.[p]

text.key: あの商人さん、この街に定期的に来ていらっしゃるんですね。[lr]
text.en-US: That salesman will be coming to our town regularly now, right?[lr]

text.key: お仕事、きっとうまくいっているんですね。[p]
text.en-US: His business must be going well, whatever it is.[p]

text.key: あの商人さん、長距離の移動に慣れているようでした。[lr]
text.en-US: That salesman seemed very used to long-distance travel.[lr]

text.key: きっとお仕事で旅をすることが多かったんでしょう。[p]
text.en-US: I'm sure his business must've taken him on many trips.[p]

text.key: あの方は異国から商品を輸入しているんですか。[lr]
text.en-US: Does he purchase things from overseas, I wonder?[lr]

text.key: そういえば私をここに連れてくる間も、[r]
text.en-US: Come to think of it, during the time he brought me here[r]

text.key: 読めない字の書いてある荷物を幾つか見た覚えがありますね。[p]
text.en-US: I remember seeing some cases with foreign writing on them I couldn't read.[p]

text.key: 優しくはありませんでしたけど、手荒なこともされませんでした。[lr]
text.en-US: I can't say he was gentle exactly, but he was not rough with me.[lr]

text.key: 昔よりは少しお肉がついてきたかな…。[lr]
text.en-US: I wonder if I've gained some weight since back then...[lr]

text.key: そうでもないですか？[p]
text.en-US: You don't really think so?[p]

text.key: ふふっ…ちょっとくすぐったいです。[p]
text.en-US: Hehe...! That tickles a little.[p]

text.key: 格別柔らかくも硬くもないお腹だと思いますけど。[p]
text.en-US: I don't think my stomach is especially soft or hard.[p]

text.key: …特にお腹は空いてませんよ？[p]
text.en-US: ...I'm not all that hungry right now you know?[p]

text.key: お腹が空いたかもしれませんね。[lr]
text.en-US: I suppose I could be hungry.[lr]

text.key: 朝ごはん、用意しましょうか。[p]
text.en-US: Should we prepare breakfast?[p]

text.key: 少し、お腹が空いたかもしれませんね。[lr]
text.en-US: I suppose I could be a little bit hungry.[lr]

text.key: そろそろお昼ご飯のことを考えておきましょうか。[p]
text.en-US: Perhaps we should give lunch plans a thought?[p]

text.key: お腹が空いたというほどではないですけど、少し口寂しいかもしれませんね。[lr]
text.en-US: It's not that I'm particularly hungry, but I suppose I wouldn't mind a snack?[lr]

text.key: よければ、お茶にでもしませんか？[name][p]
text.en-US: If it's all right with you, shall we have some tea, [name]?[p]

text.key: ちょっと、お腹が空いてきたかもしれませんね。[lr]
text.en-US: I suppose I could be a bit hungry.[lr]

text.key: 晩御飯はどうしましょうか？[p]
text.en-US: What shall we do for dinner?[p]

text.key: んっ…。[p]
ぁうっ…。[p]
text.en-US: Auu...![p]

text.key: 大丈夫です。痛くありません。[p]
text.en-US: It's all right. They don't hurt anymore.[p]

text.key: 傷は少し、敏感になってるので…。[p]
text.en-US: My scars are just a little sensitive is all...[p]

text.key: 嫌ではないですけど、傷を触られるとなんだかゾクゾクします。[p]
text.en-US: It's not that I hate it, but having my scars touched causes me to flinch a bit.[p]

text.key: （傷跡は凹凸があるが無事な皮膚と比べて表面がつるりとしている。[p]
text.en-US: (Her scars may be uneven, but compared to her normal skin they're much smoother to the touch.[p]

text.key: （傷を撫でると筋肉がピクリと小さく動いた。[lr]
text.en-US: (As I stroked her scar I could feel the muscle underneath twitch slightly.[lr]

text.key: 神経との距離が近く敏感になっているのだろう。[p]
text.en-US: I wonder if it's because the distance to the nerve endings is shorter?[p]

text.key: その、傷を触るのが好きなんですか？[p]
text.en-US: Um, do you enjoy touching my scars?[p]

text.key: （軽く繊細な髪質だ[p]
text.en-US: (Her hair is light and feels delicate.[p]

text.key: （シルヴィの髪を指で梳く[p]
text.en-US: (I run my fingers through Sylvie's hair.[p]

text.key: （なめらかな銀髪が柔らかく光を弾いている[p]
text.en-US: (Her silky silver hair softly reflects the ambient light.[p]

text.key: 好きなだけ触ってください…[p]
text.en-US: Please, touch it as much as you like...[p]

text.key: 髪に触れてるだけなのになんだか心地いいです…。[p]
text.en-US: Even though all you're doing is touching my hair, somehow it's relaxing...[p]

text.key: ほつれてたら、直してくれますか？[p]
text.en-US: If it comes undone, can you fix it for me?[p]

text.key: ちょっとだけ、くすぐったいです。[p]
text.en-US: That tickles a little.[p]

text.key: 汚くないですよね？[p]
text.en-US: It's not dirty or anything, is it?[p]

text.key: 昔はほったらかしだったけど、[r]
text.en-US: In the past I ignored my hair completely,[r]

text.key: ここに来てから髪にも気を使うようになりました。[p]
text.en-US: but since coming here I've started to take better care of it.[p]

text.key: できる限りの手入れはしているんですよ。[lr]
text.en-US: I put as much love as I can into my hair.[lr]

text.key: [name]に少しでも綺麗だって思って欲しいですから。[p]
text.en-US: I want [name] to think I'm beautiful, after all...[p]
